Reviews.Title: Great Viewer, poor controls
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The good news first,  I love the display on my Kindle Fire HDX 7" I have used it to view movies and to read novels and I am pleased with both.  The Dolby sound quality from the speakers is phenomenal for so small a device, but the volume level doesn't go very high and at its top volume it is only what I would consider as being barely satisfactory.  If there is any background noise at all you will have problems hearing it unless you are using earphones or a headset.  My biggest complaint about the Kindle Fire HDX 7" is the location of the on/off button and the volume control. Both of these controls are under the sloped edge of the pad and if you have a leather cover for your Kindle Fire you pretty much have to remove it from the cover to access these controls.  I think the unit would be better if the control switches were on the edge like they had with the old B&W; 7" Kindle with the keyboard.  I'm finding that to get a nice leather cover like want I am having to have one custom made.  One other item that I think would make the Kindle Fire HDX better would be a USB port that allows you to use a Flashdrive with it.  This would allow you to access movies and documents from an external source without having to use a computer to transfer them via a cable.  I have a lot of movies on DVD's that I wanted to view on my Kindle Fire HDX 7" when I travel, I was able to find a program to convert them to MP4 format, but I discovered that when stored in the "myflix" folder on the Kindle I need to use the PHOTO selection on the Kindle to find them and not the movie selection, this is rather confusing especially since no instructions came with the Kindle.  Once you get over these slight inconveniences the Kindle Fire HDX 7" is a fun and useful media reader.

Reviews.Title: Replacment
Reviews.Author: Frank Butts
Reviews.Content: The wife finally wore out the old fire so it was time for an upgrade,  got to say I'm envious of the new HDX,  Just might have to get one for me.

Reviews.Title: Nice Upgrade
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: I had the old first kindle fire, that I got in 2012, no HD, bulky, and kinda heavy after I got this new one. It was having some issues, and I honestly don't think I was getting updates on it anymore. Things were just going a little down hill with the old kindle, was having freezes, and just wasn't going as fast as it could have been.What I love about my old and the new one is that I can use it as a tablet and well as an e-reader. I love love love that this new one looks more defined and more clear to me. It is a very nice upgrade. I love that it is so much smaller, and sleek. The only thing that I am not used to is the power button and the volume button being on the back. I will over time though get used to it.Battery life seems to do well, depending on your brightness. I took it with me to the lake over the weekend and didn't have to charge it once over the weekend. I only used it at night, and a few times during the day. It also charges pretty fast compared to the other kindle fire.  I also love that I can have my gmail, hotmail and pop3 emails set up on my kindle. The camera works well. It has an auto focus, and a lot of edit options. Along with many apps that you can get as well to edit photos. Overall I really like my new kindle. It has many features that I am still learning,

The home screen is great, like not having to scroll to find what I am looking for in my apps or books. Gave my old Kindle Fire to someone and they are now a Kindle fan.

Reviews.Title: No GPS?! Revised 3/27/2014
Reviews.Author: Sandra G. Cook
Reviews.Content: I ordered this Kindle as a Christmas gift for my spouse.  I usually do very thorough research before ordering online but I messed up on this one.  With all the hype about the HDX, I assumed it would include GPS.  My lowly ASUS has it so why wouldn't the much hyped HDX?  Otherwise, it has some nice features but I just have a hard time getting past this major shortcoming.  The video is very good, audio is better than on the ASUS but I prefer headphones to the built in speakers on any tablet.  Processing speed is pretty good but perhaps the most impressive feature is the "Mayday" live help.  I've only needed it a couple of times but when you need it, it's there and I was very impressed with the quick response time and the knowledge of the operator.Not a big deal to me but another standard feature on my ASUS Transformer that's missing here is an HDMI connection.  It does have Bluetooth. Wireless is a little stronger than the ASUS. This tablet also lacks a memory card slot and a rear facing camera, both of which are included on the ASUS Transformer.Other than the lack of GPS, the most irksome thing is that you're pretty much locked into Amazon for content.  Many things I would get for free on Google are not free or not available on Amazon. Oh, and did I mention, unless you get the more expensive 4G version, THIS UNIT DOES NOT HAVE GPS?!  GRRRR!  The ASUS GPS works without a wireless connection as long as you load your maps and select your route while connected to a network and keep the tablet powered up.  Even if you have the 4G version of the HDX, I would not assume that GPS will work without a 4G connection.  Otherwise, why would GPS only be available with 4G?Revision 3/27/14: The Bluetooth is picky about what it will pair with. Can't connect with my Samsung mobile headset. It is also extremely picky about wired headphone jacks. Some work sporadically but many don't work at all. Some only get mono even though they give me stereo with other devices (like my computer or my ASUS tablet). So far the only headset I've found that works reliably and really well is a (fairly pricey) Sony Walkman in-ear headset with headband.  I've also had my first poor experience with Mayday since I first posted my review. It took a very long time to finally be told that the tablet is not compatible with my Samsung Bluetooth headset. To sum up, I don't doubt this device is very good for reading books but that's not what I bought it for. It's pretty adequate for web browsing but lacks several features that are standard on many if not most Android tablets, many of which are less expensive. If I had it to do over I'd probably opt for the smaller (less expensive) companion to my ASUS Transformer.

Reviews.Author: robin s smith
Reviews.Content: LOVE LOVE LOVE it what else can I say, best purchase i have made so far, through amazon!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! still learning how to use it!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Specs Misleading...Beware New Buyers
Reviews.Author: Confederate
Reviews.Content: Although the new HDX series of these tablets are supposed to have 16-, 32-, and 64-gbs of "storage," don't be deceived. First, it doesn't give one the entire 64 gb. This is normal as formatted memory systems go, but where the misleading part comes in is that these also use storage memory for operating memory. Thus, when I downloaded so much that I only had 4 or 5 gb left, the device froze up and took forever to play streaming videos and execute files. This means that you don't get the entire memory block for storage, but that you must reserve a considerable amount of it just to operate the bloody thing!When it first began to bog down, I asked the Mayday people for assistance. They led me through a litany of things which did no good. Then when they suggested resetting the device, I asked if it would remove any of my content. No, absolutely not, they said. So I reset the device and the movies began streaming without a hitch. Great! Only when I went to my on device video library, everything I'd downloaded was gone -- almost 50 gigs of data! So I downloaded everything again and now my system barely moves.The video experts told me I should be able to fill my entire storage, but this isn't apparently true. Thus, when you buy a quality Android device that has 8- or 16-gb of memory with a storage of up to 64 gbs with an SD card,  you're getting a better system memory-wise. As far as the video help, out of five calls, three were with people who spoke such poor English that communication was all but impossible. If I'd had a heart attack while on the phone with them and needed their help, I'd be dead.If this device had an SD slot, this thing would get a raging 5-star review. But tech support is wanting, my memory is only about two-thirds of what I was expecting, and this thing isn't that fast. It requires a lot of memory, and that memory comes from the storage, regardless of what I'd been told. You may want to skip this until Amazon gives truthful specifications. I wouldn't buy it again.

Reviews.Author: DGK
Reviews.Content: I was deciding between this and an iPad for my two children.  Ultimately the choice came down to price, and Kindle FreeTime (for kids).  The iPad *may* be better for adults used to iPhones (and they may not be) but for kids, FreeTime provides an ad-free and in app purchase free experience at only 4$ per month.  Apple has NOTHING like this, so kindle wins hands down.FreeTime is really the greatest thing.  Kids easily are able to scroll through apps, videos, and books (read pop up books, self reading books, learn to read books).  They understand the interface and enjoy it. Reviews.Content: I'm thrilled I purchased this and it is used daily. It has been used for doing Facebook (a few glitches to be worked out with this one -- mainly do to not liking to type with one finger since always have typed two handed), and I know the friend of mine I bought this tablet for uses it for several other apps, which I don't recall right now. Reviews.Title: Wireless connection problem still unresolved
Reviews.Author: Albert M. Carter
Reviews.Content: Hi quality display for video streaming which works great until more than six or seven devices are on the network. When the kids show up with their iphones and laptops the kindle drops its connection every 15 minutes when the WPA-2 group handshake occurs. I can have as many other devices connected as I want, but the kindle will not stay connected when more than six or seven other devices connect. I keep my ipod, ipad, roku, and other devices off the network and the kindle works fine. I've had a service ticket open for months - wonder if they will ever have a fix?

Reviews.Title: didn't work for long
Reviews.Author: Biggi
Reviews.Content: Saved my money, bought my daughter an HD and myself and HDX for Christmas.Hers is still working though he volume is much quieter then that of the HDX version.Though I am not one to use a tablet for hours, I found it really easy to move around. I am sure there are still areas I have not explored yet nor know what to do. It will take some time to learn. Kindle is really a ease way to move around and learn.I owned a Nexxxus tablet before, gave it to my husband. It felt less personal.Kindle and connection with Amazon.com. I feel connected and great support.Sadly within 4 weeks my Kindle HDX just quit . Didn't turn on anymore. Amazon.com Kindle support was very helpful.Via phone they tried to boost it or whatever they did. But it did not work. So we agreed that I needed to ship it back.Here is where it becomes a bit odd.I told them I do not want a refurbished one. I paid for a new one and would like to have a new one.Though the agent agreed with me and assured me, when the replacement arrived, it said right on the box, refurbished one.Wow. But Amazon.com always is willing to work things out. Unfortunately in this case, the only thing that was left to do was to return the broken one, the replacement one and now order a brand new one.Apparently they are not sending out new ones to replace one.I will keep an eye on the sales. Hopefully I can purchase one soon.Love the HDX, love the service via amazon.com, but don't get that I can't get a new one as a replacement since I paid for a new one and it was only 4 weeks later that I had a problem.

Reviews.Title: Love it, but…..
Reviews.Author: Caryn
Reviews.Content: The complaints regarding a flickering screen and the blue/purple haze around the edges that I read about before purchasing, unfortunately have also held true with the one I purchased and received….i've read four books on my kindle since purchasing and the blue haze around the edges is definitely noticeable, especially when reading in a dark room.  I don't know if it's worth returning…since its not strictly an e-reader (one can do many other things on the kindle other than read…all of which are fun, interactive and are not afflicted with the blue haze border…if it was just an e-reader and it had the blue/purple haze that would be a deal breaker) it doesn't make the book too hard to read, but its distracting, and certainly puts a strain on the eyes.  The flickering screen also creeps up from time to time when I'm playing different apps (candy crunch app is when I usually see it…all the candies flicker like someones turning a light on and off).  It lasts only a few seconds then stops…these things I think are what keep this good tablet from being a great tablet.  Amazon needs to address the issues.  Other than that, I love it.

Reviews.Title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: Tonja Booth "Tonja R. Booth"
Reviews.Content: I had the Kindle 3G/WiFi keyboard, and I really love it when I got it.. I recently got the Kindle Fire HDX and I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT!!  the picture on it is crystal clear, as well as the magazines. It is very easy to navigate. I was truly impressed that all my books from my old Kindle synced to the new one.  So glad that i finally purchased it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Kenneth D John
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire is just like my PC but no hard drive to worry about. That means no virus's to worry about. The Kindle does everything my PC can do, including printing on my wireless Printer.

Reviews.Title: GREAT SIZE!!
Reviews.Author: Sandie Johnson
Reviews.Content: Very easy to hold. Great clarity. Can use either my nails or finger tips when typing!!  Fits nicely in my purse so I can take anywhere.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Sandra Irby
Reviews.Content: So much fun! I love the at the finger tips books and reviews. Easy to load apps and movies, check my email, surf internet. Skype, it is all here!

Reviews.Title: 3rd Kindle
Reviews.Author: David D. Shealor
Reviews.Content: I bought the original kindle and after a year or so it disappeared. I took that as an excuse to get the Kindle HD which was a large improvement. I read quite a few books and became ever so slightly addicted to a solitaire game. Eventually, I used that Kindle more than my PC. Then I got it into my head that I needed a 10.4 inch screen so I got one and after a day I was asking myself "why did I think this would be so great?" It was too big.So I returned it and got the 8.9 inch HDX for less than half the price. I really like this kindle. It is lighter than the HD and much faster to browse the internet. I suppose if you wanted to watch video on a tablet there would be reason to have a bigger screen but to read books and check bank balances etc the 8.9 inch HDX is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Sean Derek Brown
Reviews.Content: Great screen, easy to read, easy to use. It does exactly what I want the way that it want it to.

Reviews.Title: Great reader !!`
Reviews.Author: Sandra Pritt "bzygrl44"
Reviews.Content: Great reader.  Much improved back light, very easy to navigate between apps.  Love the added bonus of being able to read/ and listen to audible simultaneously.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet!

I only wish it had a rear-camera for taking pictures, and a good Office-like app.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HDX 7"

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX!!!
Reviews.Author: mel377
Reviews.Content: I gave up a company I-Pad I never could get to function how I am use to .. I am a PC not an Apple person.  After researching reviews done in Nov. 2013 I was ready to choose it over a Samsung or Surface Tablet.  I can do everything more efficiently now and with more confidence at customer's home and in my home depot stores.  Adobe Reader allows me to type and signature order forms, I can save them in folders (I-Pad doesn't know what a folder is and I needed them to organize) I can ATTACH things to an email to send (I hated not being able to attach files to I-Pad's emails it always embedded them) I can access Dropbox with WM Cloud App, I use Office Suite Pro for opening Word, Excel, and Power Point type documents, I have music, photos etc on it .. it's everything I needed it to be. SO glad I changed. The battery has been fine for me .. I can go about 1 week without recharging it, however I don't live on it constantly and watch a bunch of movies etc. I turned off or down anything I found out drains the battery and I have been pleased. I have a car charger too anyway. All in all it's a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Very Clear Screen

Reviews.Title: Not your typical user
Reviews.Author: David Browning
Reviews.Content: I own several Kindles ranging from basic readers to variations of the HD/HDX. Some of these devices I use as Amazon intended; others are modified to suit specific needs/interests. From a hardware perspective the HDX is outstanding and an attractive alternative to the Nexus 7 if you don't need GPS, NFC or wireless charging. On smaller tablets I prefer the Kindle form factor as I find it easer to hold in any orientation without worrying about accidental screen touches/activations. When purchased I assumed root access and perhaps an alternative ROM would eventually be needed. Turns out a different launcher (Apex or Nova) and a few side loaded apps from 1Mobile were all that was required. Didn't even need to root my HDX which technically voids Amazon's warranty. The "Mojito" operating environment is more flexible than earlier Amazon/Fire ROMs; most Android apps run perfectly with exception to the Play store (admittedly a biggie) and some Google creations. I can live without those. And I still have easy access to Prime movies and a few native Amazon apps that I happen to prefer. With minimal time and effort my HDX makes an excellent Android tablet that still leverages the best Amazon has to offer.

Reviews.Author: exmptle

I found it very easy to connect to the Wi-Fi in each hotel we stayed at.  My only complaint about this product is that it's way too sensitive to touch.  It's hard to scroll through screens without opening something about which you have no interest.

Reviews.Title: Gift

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7

Reviews.Title: Great device to use with all your Amazon digital purchases
Reviews.Author: Jay G.
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle device and my second Kindle Fire (first one was the 1st gen KF). I have to say I love it. My wife was able to try out the 8.9" KF HDX and while the movies were beautiful on it the size was not for me since I read a lot, so I got the 7"Screen = sexySound = It's a mobile device so I dont expect anything spectacular, that is where ear buds or headphones come into playCPU = Speedy little thing, quite impressedBuild Quality = SolidBattery Life = Great but like everyone else I want longer! :)Storage = 64GB and am happy Amazon offers this size and would love to see a 128GB or 256GB model in the future.OS = meh...... Read about it below.Bluetooth = WinWiFi = stable and solid I am an Android user and I like stock Android. I understand Amazon is trying to make it usable for anyone of any age sort of deal, but my biggest gripe is the freaking carousel (please fire the person/s responsible for this decision!!!) Please make a way to customize or just flat our disable for your customers that cant stand it. Second is the silk browser... I mean really come on! Why not use the default browser or Chrome that is part of Android, they are decent and average browsers that dont have issues with 60% of websites when loading them or hanging on the other 40% at random times. I just use Firefox Mobile to resolve this issue. Third and this is more of a personal issue that pops up from time to time since I got the Kindle Fire HDX and that is the seemingly constant need to be connected to the internet. When I am at home not a problem, when I am on the road really not a problem as I can use a hotspot (but do I really need to?), when I am at work that is really impossible as I have to keep it in airplane mode if I want to even bring it with me. This poses an issue sometimes when it needs to verify licensing to run some apps or play some games during lunch or waiting for code to compile, to watch a movie I downloaded from Amazon VOD so I could watch it while away from a data connection or a limited data connection in terms of data amount I can use. This needs to be resolved with all digital content that is usable on the KF HDX. I dont really have this issue when I use my Nexus 7 unless the app/game I am trying to run requires an internet connection for it to actually function due to the nature of the app/game.OK now that I got my negative out of the way lets add a few more good things to this rating.The app/game selection is pretty darn good, the game circle is cool but Amazon and Google need to make a love connection here with games that support G+ syncing so I can keep my saves of Reaper on my Android devices and KF HDX device. Don't think I need to play two separate games due to that (or at least make a way to export/import gave saves between the platforms). Digital content in terms of movies/shows and also music is great. I buy 99% of my content from Amazon as I can play the music on any platform and then stream video content to any platform. Then with the purchase of BR/DVD/Digital from the store if I cant add it to my Amazon digital library, then the support of flixster and such is available.I love reading books on this device, I have a ton of book I have purchased through Amazon and then ones I have as PDF from technical books I can send using the kindle address or side loading it. The good reads inclusion of the app is not as robust as the Android version or the website but it will do and it does let you see some other books based off of comments, ratings, and similar interest when you are looking for something a little outside your normal scope.Hope this helps other customers!

Reviews.Title: So Much More than an E-Reader!
Reviews.Author: K. Normand
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle Fire HDX 7" with 32GB as a replacement for my old Kindle, which had made its way into my son's bedroom, never to reappear (he is an avid reader). I did a LOT of research before I made my purchase and decided that this Kindle was the best fit for me. I was not disappointed!There are a few drawbacks:1. No SD card slot so on-board memory is all you get. This isn't a problem for me, since I don't have a whole lot of apps and cloud storage is available. (LOVE the cloud storage!!)2. Google apps are not supported. Reportedly people have gotten them to work on their Kindle but I wasn't able to get them going. I adapted - I get my Gmail via browser and use an alternate mapping app.3. Battery life isn't quite what I'd like, but manageable.Now for the pros:1. The size and weight is just right. It is comfortable to use - even hours on end like I do2. Clear, sharp images. I was quite impressed by how good things look on the Kindle Fire3. Cloud storage so if you get overloaded with apps or books, you can save them to the cloud for later retrieval4. A wide variety of apps will run on the Kindle Fire, ranging from games to Office apps.Once I got the Kindle Fire, I realized that I'd underestimated how much I'd use it. I not only use it for reading (which I do a lot!), but I also have Skype on it, several games, and a bunch of work-related applications. I use it to do some work-related tasks when it's not convenient to be at my computer. With the apps I've collected, I can do all of my work - even work that requires VPN -  on the Kindle - it's that good!I'll admit that the Kindle Fire is not for everyone. If you are expecting a full-blown tablet, you may not like this. It's total overkill if all you want to do is read books. If you absolutely MUST have the SD card slot or MUST run Google apps, then you should look elsewhere. However, if you are looking to read books and also watch movies or tv, play a few games, and run a few apps, then the Kindle Fire is an excellent choice.

Reviews.Title: Might not be better than HD
Reviews.Author: Ejlumley
Reviews.Content: We bought two new Kindle HD's and one HDX.  The HDX seems to be a better tablet but it is hard to pinpoint the differences between the two. The screens seems the same, the apps are the same, and the only thing we can notice different is the camera.  The HD would probably be the better deal being the price is much lower for virtually the same product.  My other complaint would be with the Prime shipping.  It took a week longer to receive than what Prime promised.  This seems to be happening a lot lately with our purchases and I am having a hard time justifying paying for the Prime membership if I'm not getting my products on time.

Reviews.Title: Stunning Display On a Quality Product
Reviews.Author: MTCUBED66
Reviews.Content: I have been using another brand tablet for about a year. I decided, because of battery issues with the old tablet, to buy a new one. I did quite a bit of research and decided on the Kindle Fire HDX. Boy am I glad I did! The quality of graphics is superb. My old tablet looks like crap after seeing the quality of this Kindle. It is very "user friendly". I thought I might need to buy a book to help me figure it out, but it is pretty straightforward and there is a help function built in. It is sooooo faaaaaast!!!! I am loading apps in 1 second compared to 10 or 15 seconds. I guess that is the difference between the dual core and quad core. I already had most of my apps from the Amazon App Store, so that was a bonus. This tablet comes pre-installed with the Amazon App Store (which gives away one free app of the day FAOTD every day). Transferring to the new tablet was almost seamless. You have the option at setup to become an Amazon Prime member, which would be good if you like to watch TV episodes or movies (one free month, then pay). Amazon Customer Service is fantastic too!! Maybe some of the people that complain about it would complain about anything, no matter what! I found Amazon Customer Service knowledgeable, kind, FAST with helping. All around, a very good investment. This is a good quality product. By the way, the accessories offered for this tablet are fantastic too!

Reviews.Title: Awesome

Reviews.Content: I use it daily & love it.  From now on all the books I read will be on my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: its the best!

On top of that, having Amazing Prime lets me watch movies & TV shows as well as borrowing a book each month (Geez!  I sound like a commercial, but I love this thing!!!)

Reviews.Title: Great

Reviews.Content: This is an amazing product and I recommend it to anyone. Definitely a 5 star rating from me. A must buy to.

Reviews.Title: great product

Reviews.Content: very happy with performance, app availability, and convenience!glad i didn't spend more for i-pad or any other tablet.only wish yhat i had gotten the larger version

Reviews.Title: Great product

Reviews.Content: I received the Kindle Fire HDX on time and love everything about it.  The Wi-Fi works well and I can check "E" mail and Facebook as well as play games and read books,

Reviews.Title: I absolutely love it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "winnielss"
Reviews.Content: I can now carry more than one book when I go travel without putting too much weight in my suitcase. More importantly, I can read while my boyfriend is asleep right next to me without turning the light on. It was the best Xmas gift for me!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: Grace Roderick
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy my kindle but it will freeze from time to time. I would tell my friends about it.

Reviews.Title: INSTRUCTIONAL FLAW
Reviews.Author: thomas a cappelloni
Reviews.Content: I AM NOT TECHNICALLY SAVVY.  I WOULD HAVE NEVER PURCHASED ANY DEVICE LIKE THIS.  IT WAS A GIFT FROM FRIENDS WHO ARE DETERMINED TO DRAG ME INTO THE 21ST CENTURY.  I EMBRACED IT.  I HAVE TRIED TO USE IT, AND HAVE ENJOYED THE THINGS I HAVE BEEN ABLE TO FIND.  THE BIGGEST PROBLEM FOR MYSELF AND MANY LIKE ME WHO CAME THROUGH COLLEGE AND GRADUATE SCHOOL WHEN COMPUTERS WERE HOUSED IN AIR CONDITIONED ROOMS, AND DATA WAS ENTERED ON PUNCH CARDS ---IS--- THERE IS NO USEFUL WAY TO FIND OUT HOW TO USE THE NUMEROUS FACITS OF THIS DEVICE.  THE TUTORIALS ARE VIRTUALLY USELESS.  SO THE DEVICE IS OF LIMITED VALUE TO ME.  I NEED AN INSTRUCTION APP THAT STARTS WITH A PICTURE THAT SHOWS YOU HOW TO TURN IT ON, AND DOES EVERY FUNCTION FROM THAT POINT.  YOUR INSTRUCTIONS ARE GEARED TO PEOPLE WHO HAVE COME UP WITH THIS TECHNOLOGY FROM KINDERGARTEN.  AND SO YOU LOSE AN ENTIRE MARKET BASE AMONG THE 50-70 YEAR OLD PEOPLE WHO WOULD LIKE TO USE A KINDLE, BUT DON'T HAVE GRANDCHILDREN OR GRADE- SCHOOLERS TO GIVE THEM TUTORIALS.

Reviews.Title: Almost there...
Reviews.Author: XJCraver
Reviews.Content: Nice little tablet. Handy for checking emails, forums, and such, and very easy to use.  BUT.....Amazon and Google have GOT to get their heads together, and come up with a way for me (and others) to access the Android apps I've ALREADY PAID FOR in the Play store.  It's ridiculous the amount of functionality you lose not being able to access those apps.  If I could link this thing to my Verizon phone, and have all my Play store apps on this thing, it would've got 4 1/2 stars instead of 3.  Very disappointed that I have to hack this thing to be able to use it to it's potential.  And before you go all "read about it before you buy it" on me - I received this as a gift.  I had no choice in the matter...The other 1/2 star it's lacking is an easy fix, and it flat boggles my mind that Amazon didn't include it in the programming  -  NO HAPTIC FEEDBACK OPTIONS?????????  That's basic, kindergarten-level stuff some programmer left out, and it's beyond annoying.  Really would make this thing much more user-friendly if these buttons gave me some feedback when I touched them.So overall,  3 stars.  I'd be fine with recommending it as a purchase, just do your research first and make sure you can do without your Play Store apps.  And do NOT gift it to someone, unless they're on their knees begging.  There are similarly priced tablets out there that will much better suit the average Android user.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire is limitless!
Reviews.Author: D Miller
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this!  Best electronic I have owned! Would definitely recommend this....great for reading books, internet, games,  emails, etc.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Device
Reviews.Author: N. Herndon
Reviews.Content: I bought a KindleFire for my 5-year-old for Christmas, and I received one for Christmas.  The devices work great, and the customer service is awesome.  You can talk to a tech representative within 10 seconds of clicking the Help button.  I only have two complaints: the Parental Controls feature is a bit awkward to use, and unless I personally sign my son on to the device, he can pick it up and play with it while it is not under the account I have set up for him.  Also, the origami case is not very substantial, and the only other option I have found for this device is the Otter Box--which costs almost $70.  It would be really nice to have a substantial cover for the KindleFire that didn't cost 1/3 as much as the device itself!  But the KindleFire is user-friendly and intuitive to use for the most part.

Reviews.Title: Everything in ONE except HDMI out
Reviews.Author: Ludovic
Reviews.Content: I love everything about it, its a PC, library, movie theatre, literally anything and everything you could want it to be.  The only thing I wish it had was a HDMI out port, maybe the next generation model will have this, if so you have a repeat customer and I'll likely get a larger screen.

Reviews.Title: Nice replacement for a laptop when traveling
Reviews.Author: Donald Cooley
Reviews.Content: It has great graphics and is easy to get the hang of to use, just a little difficult for me to type using the keyboad

Reviews.Title: I now have 3 kindles!! This is the best because of the mayday button I love that feature.
Reviews.Author: sandra k neveadomis
Reviews.Content: I also am happy that the battery lasts a bit longer then the kindle fire. I haven't tried watching a movie as yet but I like that option.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding!
Reviews.Author: Brian Weeks
Reviews.Content: I Love this thing.  My only complaint would be the fact that I can't play some adobe supported videos and some YouTube videos.  Other than, it is amazing!  Display mirroring is really cool.

Reviews.Title: grab one quick!
Reviews.Author: vintage-attic
Reviews.Content: Awesome resolutionMay day is worth its weight in goldEasy to learnGreat free appsVery light and easy to holdFor a first time user it can't be beatBattery doesn't last long enoughNo directions on unitOverall best buy

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Mary M. Bilson
Reviews.Content: The graphics are bright, and clear.  Easy to use and manuever around the internet.  Great for reading, and playing games.  Has decent sound quality for easy music listening.  This is my second Kindle Fire.  My first one was 1st generation.  Moving up and if Kindle continues to keep up like this I would get another one in a couple of years.  Love my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: love my Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: packfan1Montana
Reviews.Content: Excellent speed fast internet easy to use I don't even use my computer much any more its portable  just love it

Reviews.Title: So fun!
Reviews.Author: Wildwood
Reviews.Content: I received this as a gift.  I'm really enjoying using it.  I find I read far more and enjoy reading even more. It certainly does everything I would use a tablet/reader for and with the wireless keyboard I purchased separately-its perfect.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7" :  How did I ever live without it?
Reviews.Author: Ronald Burich
Reviews.Content: My Kindle Fire was a surprise gift for Christmas.  It is easy to use, and the clarity and color are unsurpassed!  It's easy to use, even for an oldie like me.  The price is great for the quality of the product.  I love it!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Rozita Bozhinova
Reviews.Content: I got my Kindle Fire as a Christmas gift from my husband and I found it is so useful for me- light, bright, keeping me connect to Internet, able to read without glasses :), and easy fit in my pocket or/and bag.

Reviews.Title: Love!
Reviews.Author: Jmar
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire hdx! It's very easy to navigate. It's makes reading so much better than just picking up a book.

Reviews.Title: Nice Gadget!
Reviews.Author: Mrs. LaNeka Hale
Reviews.Content: This a great tablet for surfing the web, reading, & playing games. It comes in handy when you are lying in bed or lounding around on the sofa. If you do not want to go and sit at your desk top, this will be perfect. It is sleek and easy to hold in hands especially if you purchase the case (Supcase) with the insert for your hand. Also the resolution is superb. It has a crystal clear picture view. The only reason I gave it 4stars is because when trying to connect to WiFi away from home can be somewhat a drag.

Reviews.Title: great device for a great price!!
Reviews.Author: Jordyn
Reviews.Content: Love love love my kindle fire HDX! I used to have an iPad, however reading on it always gave me a headache so I turned to kindle! Now I can read for hours in the light or dark and the screen never gives me any issues. Another good thing compared to the iPad is reading in the sun, no problem for the kindle...good luck with the iPad and your shades on. Just not gonna happen. The kindle has just as many apps as the iPadand the screen resolution is better than the iPad. The battery lasts really long as well!! I use my kindle for everything from emails to facebook to reading my favorite books!! I'll never go back to the iPad!

Reviews.Title: The best Kindle yet
Reviews.Author: Ronald G. Glover
Reviews.Content: I am a voracious reader, as is my wife.  We each have Kindle E-readers.  She likes her Paperwhite Kindle very much, but when I had one, I did not care for it.  I borrowed my Granddaughter's first generation Kindle Fire and liked it, so bought a first generation Kindle Fire HD.  I liked the concept, but had so much trouble with failures with them (I had and sent back 3 of them), that I got to know the tech support people pretty well.  I kept the last Fire HD I had since it semi-worked.  Finally, however, with much trepidation (and a $50 one day price drop) I purchased the new Kindle Fire HDX.  It has proven perfect.  It has not crashed nor given me blank pages or any of the myriad problems I had with my Fire HDs.I had read of complaints with blue/purple borders on the HDX, but I did not see it with mine.  My wife said she saw a faint blue tinge at the edges, but it was not bothersome.  I use my HDX almost exclusively for reading and I prefer the black background with white printing so blue/purple borders are not an issue anyhow.I think if you have been disappointed with the first generation Fire HD you will be pleased with the HDX, at least as an E-reader.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Melissa Kay Krause
Reviews.Content: It is great. I have my books on hand without taking up room& plus it is my tablet much more compact than my laptop& lighter to carry. It fits easily in my purse. It was the perfect t gift. My husband did great in picking it out.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: EPIC minecraft lover
Reviews.Content: This is THE most epic gift you could give someone! In fact, I'm even typing this review on it now!!!!! Very pleased. :@)

Reviews.Title: overall great, with some features being missed
Reviews.Author: Analyzerlx
Reviews.Content: The tablet is great at what it is intended to do. I can read books and surf the net with ease. I have found some nice games to play, the little issues I see are just annoyances. If the tablet had a rear-facing camera  I would be a little happier. It just heightens the value aspect. I also would have loved to have able a quick charger standard instead of having to pay!  The standard charger takes hours to charge while using it. Overall I am happy with the quality hardware and available apps.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: grubb
Reviews.Content: Perfect size for reading, traveling, entertainment!  Graphics outstanding and the weight is perfect!  I bought two for my house and highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Maggie Hall
Reviews.Content: I had an original Kindle and just got the Fire HDX over Christmas and couldn't be happier with it! It has everything.g I need and is so easy to travel with. I highly recommend!!

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Charlesa
Reviews.Content: I love it more everyday! I use it for everything from reading to my Calculus homework!!! Couldn't be happier!  Yay!!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HDX is the best device out there!
Reviews.Author: kimberly
Reviews.Content: I love it. It's sold at a reasonable price and gives people the option of adding additional services only if  they choose to do so.

Reviews.Title: Review of Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Deb North
Reviews.Content: It's not as easy to use and get aps for as the ipad...also not as many free aps...I hope with more time, I'll get used to it.

Reviews.Title: does the job
Reviews.Author: August
Reviews.Content: So far its good. I wish it had android apps, but good for gaming. Sounds great with dual speakers. Would give it five if it didn't freeze up so far at least six times since Xmas.

Reviews.Title: confusing
Reviews.Author: Joy Carl
Reviews.Content: It's a great tablet, my friends have it and I love playing games on it, but it's horribly confusing. The mayday button helps a lot, but the setup process can be a struggle. After you set it up, though, it's great for hours at a time!

Reviews.Title: I love it but...
Reviews.Author: Melbell
Reviews.Content: I love it but it needs a two way camera. The camera only faces the person looking at the screen. It would also be great if it had a usb port and supported adobe flash player so I could play some of my favorite games. Other than that it is awesome. Amazon has great deals on it also.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Wayne S. Laird "deer hunter"
Reviews.Content: Great product and price. Always someone to help you with any problem you have with it. I will recommend this to everyone.

Reviews.Title: kindlr fire hdx
Reviews.Author: mary j. williams
Reviews.Content: Best thing  did for myself in a long time.  Having lots of fun with it and learning to use with the help features and functionality. Thanks for all the help and making my day brighter. Reading is so much clearer and pictures are fun to show, if I ever get that part down.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Kalen Brown "Kalen~Brown"
Reviews.Content: There's nothing better than the kindle fire HDX!!!!! Great, clear picture and multitasking is terrific! I love it!!! I have the 7.0 and its just a wonderful thing. If your looking for a tablet I highly recommend the kindle fire HDX

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: svetlana
Reviews.Content: Got a Kindle Fire HDX 7 for Christmas!!!! great for watching videos doesn't buffer or blur!!!! also the mayday is very helpful

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Donna L Wood
Reviews.Content: This was the best purchase I have made. My Kindle Fire HDX has proven to be the best tablet I have own. It's far better than the iPad. All of the apps that I need for my work were easily downloaded for a reasonable price. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Nanci Rose
Reviews.Content: I got this as a Christmas gift and I love it. I use it everyday and it holds a charge for a couple of days.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Suzanne Martin
Reviews.Content: I resisted buying one of these because I wanted to support my local book store.  Now that I got my Kindle Fire HDX, I read more and always have an assortment of books to read whenever I want.  The convenience is the best!

Reviews.Title: great purchase
Reviews.Author: Courtney Walker
Reviews.Content: I'm a big reader and this is a perfect device for it. I wish the screen had a paper looking screen option like the old kindle because it really does make a difference and is easier on the eyes.I wish silk would run Adobe and automatically include a word processor.Not to mention, it is a beautiful device and the display is awesome.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HDX is great.
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: The help icon is great. The answers to questions have been clear, fast and easy to implement.The Kindle Fire HDX has all the features that we wanted.

Reviews.Title: You can't go wrong!
Reviews.Author: Margie Traweek
Reviews.Content: We love it! Easy to learn and it gives you plenty of help along the way. Screen is bright but easy on these old eyes. Would recommend this over Apple only because of it's ease of use.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying my new Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: marylou Ferris
Reviews.Content: Just learning/exploring my new Kindle Fire . Have to learn how to navigate, not be in a hurry, just have fun.

Reviews.Title: Here is a great device,
Reviews.Author: Richard L Glick
Reviews.Content: I have only had my Kindle since Christmas and I love it!It is one of the quickest little devices that I have ever had!

Reviews.Title: Kids Love it!
Reviews.Author: Will
Reviews.Content: Both my boys (10 and 12) were both asking for tablets last year so i bought them both a Kindle Fire for Christmas and they Love them.

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX "7"
Reviews.Author: jeff brownstein
Reviews.Content: This is the first review I have ever written for any product that I have ever purchased. It will be brief.  I LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX "7"This is the journey I took before I settled on my HDX "7".Purchased Barnes And Noble HD 9.0. Returned it. Purchased Google Nexus 7 Second Generation. Returned it  Purchased Samsung Note 8 for an amazing $225 from Staples because of coupons and store discounts. No rebates to wait for. It was an incredible deal. Returned it. Purchased apple mini with retina display for $399. Returned it. Purchased Kiindle Fire HDX 8.9. returned it.The HDX "7" and HDX "8.9" are both amazing. I settled on the "7" because I bought it from BEST BUY for $239. The HDX "8.9" was $429 for the 32 gig unit. Four things. The Display color is awesome! The display screen resolution is incredibly sharp and the "READING VIEW" is a true joy when I'm reading digital media such as CNN and MSN. ( Reading View feature is only available on certain websites so  it's not on all the websites I browse but it's a fantastic feature to have!!) The audio is wonderful. I also am very impressed with the "MAYDAY" feature which connects you with a live technical advisor in 15 seconds by simply clicking on "MAYDAY". I can think of a few times when I wasn't and home received help instantly. The "MAYDAY" Tech. drew red circles on my screen so I could see what he was doing and fixed my problem remotely. I LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX "7"!!!!

Reviews.Title: Either lied to or misinformed repeatedly
Reviews.Author: Eric Newkirk
Reviews.Content: The main reason I my Kindle so I can start buying or renting e-books for college instead of dealing with the college bookstore. The very first book I rented, "Core Concepts in Cultural Anthropology 5th addition" from Kindle, I was unable to download the textbook to my computer. After dealing with Kindle tech-support for a very long time. All he could do was apologize and tell me the book is not compatible with my computer. The main reason, as I stated above, and the only reason I bought the Kindle fire 7 inch HDX was to be able to have my college texts on the go with me and on my computer at home. I asked all these questions through Amazon and Kindle sales and tech personnel through online chats before deciding on the purchase. As I stated the main reason for the purchase was to have the ability to rent or purchase each texts, but as I learn more about the Kindle. I decided the extra bells and whistles would be nice to have also. Another disappointment you give us a camera with absolutely no way to take good pictures because you can't see what you're taking a picture of. I still have time to return this product and plan on doing so, but I'll have to take a loss on the case and screen protector that I purchased in anticipation of my Kindle's arrival. I have lost count of how many people came up to me on campus, who see me with my Kindle and asked my opinion. And I'm sorry to say I have told all of them to search for another product and not waste their money or time discussing this product sales or tech-support who knowingly lie in order to sell more product. Sincerely disappointed Eric Newkirk

Reviews.Title: frustrate with kindle
Reviews.Author: dona
Reviews.Content: I bought the kindle for my husband for x-mas. He finds it very hard to navigate from program to the next and battery life is very short.He now wants me to print out the user manual. I'm about to through both of them out the window.frustrate

Reviews.Title: Meh
Reviews.Author: Terisa Kerr
Reviews.Content: The first one froze after I opened a book and then suffered an irrecoverable crash a few days later.  We are now on our second Kindle Fire HDX.  I've turned it on once to register.The device, overall, I am not impressed with.  The device seems unreliable.  We bought 2.  One we sent back.  My first impression was that it was a big Amazon advertisement and you must dig for programs to operate non-Amazon books.  The Kindle Free Time also does not work like I was led to believe.  Also, it isn't secured/encrypted.  The clarity and battery life are excellent.Overall, I personally  would rather have a Samsung Tablet.  These were gifts for my kids and I wish their dad would have saved his money.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed & frustrated!
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Lewton
Reviews.Content: We purchased the kindles as gifts for our 2 sons. Each has one. Bought these because we thought the parental controls would be good. Like setting up time limits. I own a Apple Ipad which I love! Kindle is  very confusing. Took me awhile to figure out how to set it up & still haven't figured out the time limit thing :( Not happy with this at all :(Ive attempted to set up times for my kids to play or just maybe 1 hr a day with no luck!Also, the games are always freezing so we have to constantly hold the power button & shut off the kindle and restart. Never had this problem ever with my IPad.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: L.  Puran
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle Fire HDX .Everything thing is so conveniently placed and it's so lightweight and easy to use . It makes my Kindle Fire feel ancient.

Reviews.Title: No Adobe Flash = Not for me
Reviews.Author: Peter S.
Reviews.Content: Sadly returned the item within days of purchase, as I was unaware it did not have Adobe Flash installed.  I receive a fair number of newsletters given the industry I work in, and as newsletters become more multimedia, I needed a device that had flash installed.I now own the Surface 2, and have no complaints.  It is more expensive, but it satisfies all my business needs and then some.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire HDX 7.  Screen is very clear. I received it in a timely manner.  Defintely recommend Kindle Fire!

Reviews.Title: pretty easy
Reviews.Author: Dianne McKee
Reviews.Content: I'm not real tech savvy but this has been quite easy to navigate. I use more as a tablet than a reader. Only problem has been getting certain videos to play.

Reviews.Title: love it, 5 stars not enough
Reviews.Author: Sandra Eisenmann
Reviews.Content: Love, love my new kindle, fan since the first kindle came on the market. Plus Amazon, never disapoints, best customer service.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: waynesigmon
Reviews.Content: Used my friends kindle,so I bought one.it's fast and fits my needs.the best on the market as far as I'm concerned.

Reviews.Title: I am new to the kindle and am learning how to use it, so far I really like it.
Reviews.Author: helen haynes
Reviews.Content: i REALLY LIKE THE KINDLE. I WISH THERE WAS A BOOK THAT CAME WITH THE DEVICE EXPLAINING HOW IT WORKS

Reviews.Title: like it for price
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: Great value customer service gets five stars which makes issues not so bad. Few crash problems with some apps but all in all great product.

Reviews.Title: light weight, nice crisp picture, fast
Reviews.Author: imelda asares
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet. Overall, its got everything I need and my kids is loving it too. I like to recommend this to any of my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: my kindle
Reviews.Author: maxine springer
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle but it does not have an outside camera and it does not allow you to have a background on the opening and home scream. I like it because of the books it has.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for reading Kobo E-books
Reviews.Author: darius tadjrishi
Reviews.Content: Its also really good with Nook E-Books. Black and white is so much better in HD colour. Storage is also really good - you can use the box to hold pens and calculators.

Reviews.Title: Very good, but...
Reviews.Author: Book Lover
Reviews.Content: 1. Despite the apparent clarity of the display, I get eyestrain using it much sooner than with the Paperwhite, 2. the OS is corruptible (probably caused by the attempted auto-update of an app I downloaded from the Amazon Kindlefire hdx "store" - I had to do a factory reset when despite excellent Wifi connection, I couldn't communicate with any on-line sites one morning, despite being able to do so for a week after installing that app, 3. the on/off/hibernate button is on the bottom - which is a pain when you're using a cover or case that fold back behind the device - what was so bad about having the button on the front of the frame?, 4.The hurdles Amazon has erected to deny access to the fully compatible apps in the Google apps "store" seems petty.  The web is full of detailed instructions how to circumvent the issue.  I bought the device primarily as an e-reader that has much enhanced internet connectivity compared with the Paperwhite.  As an e-reader I much prefer the Paperwhite.  As an internet device for web browsing and e-mail use, the Kindle Fire HDX is much better than the Paperwhite.  Now if the engineers could incorporate both types of display into one screen and have it automatically switch from one to the other depending on the task being performed - THAT would be a great device!

Reviews.Title: Not pleased
Reviews.Author: Brad Singley
Reviews.Content: Not pleased with this purchase at all.  Internet connectivity problems and very slow response times when using it to read books.

Reviews.Title: Please fix
Reviews.Author: she37
Reviews.Content: This kindle freezes and won't play a lot of games that I have downloaded. Sometimes in the middle of something I'm doing it goes back to home page. We have 2 other kindle fires hd in our house those have no issues. Really hope you resolve these issues cause we really enjoy your other product.

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: Sophia demitrio
Reviews.Content: 1st time kindle user. Good for books. Not good for other stuff. Can't play videos. Plus not happy with continuous advertising on screen saver page. Haven't figured how to stop that yet.

Reviews.Title: Superb
Reviews.Author: H. S. Miller "insatiable reader"
Reviews.Content: I have gotten every 7" Fire as it came out.  All have been a pleasurable experience, but this HDX has exceeded all my expectations by far!  I was reluctant to get it as I only expected a software update and a few added gizmos.  I had hoped they would include another camera on it too, but no.What pushed me over the edge in purchasing it was a $50 coupon sent to me as a Prime customer, plus the knowledge I could sell my older HD Fire and recoup even more of the purchase price so it seemed to be worth a major software upgrade, all by itself.WOW!  Holy computational power, Batman!!!  I am more than delighted with this 7" HDX!  The total difference between the older Fire HD generation one and this Fire HDX is amazing!  Incredible value here!  My only regret is that it doesn't support Flash, but neither did the HD unless you sideloaded Dolphin, and for the most part I can do without having Flash on it.  I do hope a software upgrade will enable Flash videos on it, and soon, but with the outstanding performance and speed of the HDX as it is, I can live without having Flash.  Besides, what a lot of people don't realize is, if you use any other OS (in order to view Flash) rather than the Amazon version, you lose all the great benefits of Amazon's cloud loading and storage, which is part of the reason for it's speed and super flexibility.This HDX is a true world-beater.  I can't imagine what even newer models could provide in addition except another camera on the 7" model.  I have not used the Mayday help feature, but since I've used Fires from the very beginning I'm used to handling the OS.  I can see where the Mayday help feature could be absolutely invaluable to a beginning purchaser, though.  You get help on the spot and instantly.

Reviews.Title: Great Device - Compact & Fast
Reviews.Author: Harry C Mounts
Reviews.Content: I was looking for something small and compact, yet powerful enough to download and stream fast. I found it in the Kindle Fire HDX. This is such a versatile computer, I find myself NOT using my smartphone or laptop pc. Picture quality is great, fast downloads, fast streaming, plenty of apps to choose, and it's a great device to read those novels you've been wanting to download. I've had the Kindle for six weeks now and use it daily - not one problem. Very satisfied customer!

Reviews.Title: Only One Complaint
Reviews.Author: Reva M Wamsley
Reviews.Content: I love this except for one thing.  I can't get through a whole book without having to recharge it.  I had a Kindle touch before & I could read maybe two books without having to recharge.  But other than that, I love it.  The color is great, I love the lighted screen & being able to access the internet to check my email & Facebook.One other slight problem is that I have it in a case & the on off switch on the back is a little awkward to get to. But on the other hand, it won't get pushed accidently there.

Reviews.Title: Greatest Tablet I have ever used
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have had every kindle fire since they have been released.I always thought they were great for what they were - a great discount tablet that got the job done while also having access to all of my amazon content.This kindle fire hdx blew my mind.  This is one of the highest quality tablets I have ever used.  I argue that this is just as nice as my mother's iPad.  The device is fast.  The OS has major improvements.  That was always my issue with past kindle fires.  The OS was slow and buggy and the browser was awful and you couldn't organize apps very well.This is all changed.  You can organize apps beautifully.  The amazon app store finally has enough apps where I am satisfied (even though it is still lower than google play and the apple app store, it has everything I need).  The silk browser is awesome on this device.  Even if I had the opportunity, I wouldn't switch to another browser.I have not used the mayday button because I am pretty tech savvy, but I am considering getting my grandfather one solely for this reason.If you have any doubts about purchasing this, do it.  Especially if you are a college student.  Textbooks are so cheap on the kindle store, you can highlight and make notes in them, and it syncs to all of your other kindle devices.This device is light. and when I say light, I argue that it weighs about the same as my smartphone.  I can hold it in one hand with ease all day.The battery is not as good as past kindle fires, but I can't complain because of the performance increase.  I can still get a full days use out of it as long as I am not constantly watching videos.  Also - being able to download prime videos to the device is awesome.Overall, I would highly recommend this device to anyone and everyone.  You won't be disappointed.  Great job amazon! - Keep it up.

Reviews.Title: Comments on the Kindle Fire.
Reviews.Author: Bob Smyser
Reviews.Content: I don't like the front cover.  I would have preferred a hard cover.  It also shuts off right after I turn it on, even after a full charge. It seems to run alright when I start it up the 2nd. time.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied.
Reviews.Author: Doris Colavolpe
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for a family member.  She loves it and is more than satisfied with the product.

Reviews.Title: So far so good.
Reviews.Author: Howard Walker
Reviews.Content: I would have liked a few more "Getting Started" directions. Just some basics. We live in a rural area and it's hard to find someone to talk to for advice. Once we got up and running- which was a task for two 73 year olds the panic button saved us. Also, it would have been nice to have a front facing lens. We don't always like what we see in the "selfies".

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be happier with this device!
Reviews.Author: rywriteroregon
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter(14yr old). She plays games on it, reads books on it, uses apps. At half the price(or less) of an iPad, it's a steal!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Free Time Sets this Device Apart
Reviews.Author: LillianasLibrarian
Reviews.Content: My family owns the original Kindle Fire.  We also have 2 iPad Air's and an iPad mini.  The Kindle Fire HDX was purchased as a Christmas gift to myself as my 4 year old daughter was hogging her grandmother's Kindle (and mine).  So it was purchased with the thought that I would use it (primarily to read library ebooks, check email and facebook, and play some games).After about 2 weeks of use I was contemplating returning it as we really weren't using it to warrant the purchase, and we discovered that we would soon have access to 2 more iPads (the Airs).Then I realized that FreeTime wasn't just a thing to restrict access, that for only $2.99 (Prime members) a month my daughter would have access to a lot of her favorite apps and tons and tons of great books and videos.  Content is added frequently, which is a huge concern for me.  One of our biggest struggles was that my daughter constantly wants me to download her new games, often minutes after downloading something.  FreeTime completely eliminates that, which is amazing!!I still wish many things available for the iPad were available on the Kindle and I still use the iPad more when browsing the Internet or playing games on the Internet.  I also know that if it wasn't for my daughter, I would definitely have all I need in the original Fire.

Reviews.Title: Daughters gift
Reviews.Author: khel
Reviews.Content: My daughter was so surprised and excited to receive the Kindle.  Now her boyfriend wants one after using her kindle.

Reviews.Title: my kids loved it...
Reviews.Author: Diana  Melissa
Reviews.Content: Very happy!!!! It was a Christmas presents for my kids and they love it I recommend not only for the games now they are reading more books

Reviews.Title: It would have been 5 stars except...
Reviews.Author: Douglas Dickerson "codougd"
Reviews.Content: ... for the annoying carousel and the fact that there is no way to disable it.Overall, the Kindle HDX is exactly as I expected and fits my needs, as planned and anticipated.The Kindle is NOT a "general purpose" tablet replacement or competitor. Its strengths are aimed squarely at us members of the Amazon ecosystem.It is a very good ereader. The color screen is crisp and, as a color screen, is more suitable for technical volumes than the B&W; Kindles. The is some glare in bright light but that is the trade-off for color.The included apps are good enough. I appreciate being able to jump to a browser to research something I encounter in book I am reading. The Silk browser is much improved over previous instances. The mail app is also good enough for casual use.I don't watch videos on the Kindle so I can't comment on the performance at that task. I have watched some video tutorials using the browser and that worked well.In all, if you accept that the Kindle is a media consumption device with hooks into and dependencies upon the Amazon ecosystem and if that is why you bought it you will be very happy. If you buy it as a cheaper alternative to other Android-based tablets you will likely be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: WIFI Connectivity
Reviews.Author: Lucy Cardona, Ph.D., LCSW
Reviews.Content: I was very ambivalent about returning the new Kindle Fire HDX 7" which I ordered one week ago.  This is because the HDX 7 has a great high definition display, is easy to use, and seemed to have better connectivity to the internet than did my old Kindle Fire. Today, I was at Starbucks, where I tried connecting to the internet through their free WIFI service, but failed to connect. I had not tried connecting in other environments other than in my home where I have high sped internet through a cable company. Thus, I ran into the very same connectivity issues that I had with my old Kindle. This was very disappointing as I had been reassured by the Amazon chat tech that the connectivity problems had been significantly improved (in the HDX 7'). For this reason, I made the decision not to order the 4G internet (Verizon) with it and ordered solely the WIFI connection for it. I am returning the device in the morning. I will explore other Kindle Fire products and likely order a more expensive model but this time, include the 4G (Verizon) with it.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Robert Hurst
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I finally bought a Kindle HDX.  Not disappointed one bit as it met all my expectations.

Reviews.Title: the Fire is epic
Reviews.Author: Evil Sandwitch
Reviews.Content: The Kindle fire is epic, every thing loads fast and so far every 3D app i've tried has had no problems. only two things i dislike: The Boot up time after you turn it off is slow, and the fact that i can't use Google Play.

Reviews.Title: Hot to trot!
Reviews.Author: msdale
Reviews.Content: I lost my Kindle Fire HD so, after looking for weeks, decided to buy another but thought I'd "step up" to the next level. It is lighter in weight and as easy to use as the HD. I had to figure out where the buttons are but really like the style.Easy to use, easy to read, great colors and graphics.

Reviews.Title: TOTALLY LOVE MY NEW KINDLE!!!!
Reviews.Author: NORMA
Reviews.Content: I totally love my new Kindle... upgrade to my 2nd edition.  Don't get me wrong I love my previous Kindle and I plan to keep it since I have notices that it allow you see more Audiobook similar than the new one.  I also love the idea of having help at my fingertips with the MayDay button!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Penny Canter
Reviews.Content: Although I didn't purchase the Kindle for 'reading' I really like the convenience of having all the books I am reading together and easy to carry anywhere. I was looking for something smaller than my laptop, yet bigger than my cell phone, for quick and easy internet access.The kindle is just the right size.

Reviews.Title: It's Another Winner!
Reviews.Author: Linda T
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband for Christmas and he loves it. He's not real computer savvy and this is his first tablet and he's been able to do all the things without having to "call for help" from me or the helpful person at Amazon. He downloaded a movie on it and the sharpness and clarity of both the picture and the sound were great. I have one of the older Kindle fires and I can't wait to upgrade to this new one.

Reviews.Title: Another great product.
Reviews.Author: jason
Reviews.Content: Got it for Christmas and glad I waited for the HDX instead of getting the hd model. It's super fast. It's got Miracast but unfortunately my tv doesn't support it so I can't make it mirror the screen on to the tv. Oh well.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product for Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Ernesto Tirado
Reviews.Content: Perfect fit and practical functionality. Can convert to work as a stand or handheld with attached elastic strap to use on the go. Recommend this product. Priced right and delivery as described.

Reviews.Title: AMAZON'S best
Reviews.Author: Old but hip
Reviews.Content: I love it! Sure it is an access devise for anything AMAZON, but what's wrong with that? I have an AMAZON PRIME account and I am able to watch free videos all day from the extensive list of movies, TV shows, and specials. I can check my e-mail, go online, check my FACEBOOK page and choose from hundreds of free and low priced APPS. The screen resolution is top notch, stereo speakers are loud and easy to adjust. All in all a great device, well worth the low price.

Reviews.Title: Great for Grandpa!
Reviews.Author: Susan Key Shelton
Reviews.Content: Great product for my dad who had no experience with electronics! We haven't had a lot of time to walk him through some basic things, I like knowing he can get a rep at the push of a button that will help him with anything.

Reviews.Title: Like it
Reviews.Author: Terry
Reviews.Content: I understand the previous HD version had a HDMI output.  An HDMI output would have been good for the HDX also.

Reviews.Title: Small but capable
Reviews.Author: Stuart I. Riley
Reviews.Content: This is not the smallest e-reader or tablet, but the one filled to the brim with features, gorgeous display and easy viewing. Movies, books, audio, and apps all run in superior order, with the only down side, is memory expandability (an extra slot for loading more solid state memory as a card). That is a very minor factor, given its rich feature set, brilliant display and ease of viewing a movie or playing an action game.  It met my expectations and more.

Reviews.Title: Just the right size!
Reviews.Author: Andrea L. Gillan
Reviews.Content: My new Kindle is easy to take with me wherever I go. Fits snuggly in my purse. Like having a library at my fingertips. The screen displays are crisp and easy to use. It is becoming indispensable.

Reviews.Title: wonderful
Reviews.Author: Grammy Pammy
Reviews.Content: This is so clear and wonderful.  This is my 3rd Kindle and my favorite. I love the size. very easy to read.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7
Reviews.Author: Brenda K. Mitchell
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX 7 is the best gift I've given in a long while, my son has enjoyed it since Christmas day and has become a real fan. like he says, it does it all, and the graphics are great and so easy to take along wherever you go. Kindle has become a big name in the family, and were ready to purchase several more. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Tim Theriac
Reviews.Content: Great for reading books and the w-fi feature makes it very handy. Still figuring out all the cool things it can do.

Reviews.Title: Would I buy this again? You bet..
Reviews.Author: LoriD "Lori"
Reviews.Content: I am totally impressed with the kindle HDX. I can have books, facebook, an appointment calendar and e-mail all on one device. I also have the weather and am able to get radio stations from just about every state in the United States. The notepad app. is a nice feature. You can take notes wherever you are without pencil and paper. If you join Prime you can borrow a book a month from the lending library and you can watch movies and videos for free. It's amazing what one little device can do. This is my first tablet so really wasn't very educated on what to do with it but I'm learning and adding things each day. I'm especially grateful for the May day feature. A tech will connect in seconds to give you help. I've been impressed with how nice everyone is and how helpful they are. Couldn't find better people. I started with an e-reader and moved up to the HDX and I am so happy I did. If you're thinking of a tablet check this one out.

Reviews.Title: All I need is an E Reader.
Reviews.Author: Karyn A. Miracle
Reviews.Content: After seeing all of the commercials, my husband was conviced this was the reader for me! I got it for Christmas and was so excited to start reading a series I bought months ago. However, I did not realize you could not get the nook app on it, and all of my old books were in my old nook ( broken by letting my little ones use it and they dropped it one too many times).  The picture on it is great I will admit, and it is a very nice tablet, but I like how user friendly the nook is better, and nook has a much better selection of books.

Reviews.Title: Loving my new tablet!
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: I simply love my new Kindle Fire HDX 7" tablet and reader. I am slowly learning all the ins and outs of this new piece of technology.

Reviews.Title: very sweet device!!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I should have bought one sooner ! Awesome clarity! Easy to use! Great selection of movies to choose from!Endless  list of books galore!

Reviews.Title: Free time rocks
Reviews.Author: Jessica Prater
Reviews.Content: It's great! Love the free time bc my son whom is 6 loves to play on it and with that app it makes it easy to just hand the device over and know he won't be buying things

Reviews.Title: Good but battery life not as good
Reviews.Author: mayank govil
Reviews.Content: Have had this for more than a month and this is my first non-Apple tablet and I LIKE IT. I had reservations in terms of performance but I am yet to come across an application crash or slowness/unresponsiveness.The only gripe I do have is the battery performance. It drains quite fast even with moderate use.

Reviews.Title: Great stuff
Reviews.Author: Kelzo
Reviews.Content: Got it for a gift. The wife loved it... Free prime for a month was great as well.. Will be purchasing amazon prime!!

Reviews.Title: Xmas for my Grandson
Reviews.Author: sue stitcher
Reviews.Content: My grand son is in love with it. We have to take away befor bed time....He tries to hide it...

Reviews.Title: It was a gift
Reviews.Author: rbertani
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my sister and she loves it. She, and her husband, plays games on it everyday. I don't even know if there are any books on it yet.

Reviews.Title: very satisfied
Reviews.Author: polly reynolds
Reviews.Content: shipping was quick and easy, opened it on christmas eve and used it right away, very pleased with the price and the purchase

Reviews.Title: Rating Kindle fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Patty Williams
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son and he loves it.  He is amazed at how clear the picture is.He said you can do almost anything on it.

Reviews.Title: Great Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: DENNIS SIMS
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with easy ability to operate. I'm not very computer literate, but have not any problems. My granddaughter has an older version, and we enjoy spending time together working on our kindles.

Reviews.Title: The best tablet!!!
Reviews.Author: Marshal
Reviews.Content: The new Kindle Fire HDX is the best you can buy on the market.  No problems with it at all!!! I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding tablet!
Reviews.Author: Keith D. Chapman
Reviews.Content: Great improvements over previous Kindle. Much better on wi-fi. Brilliant display. Would recommend to friends and family. Convenient size. Better than competing tablets tried.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: just as advertised I used the product on a 7 hr flight.  Long battery life, Crystal clear picture. Decent sound

Reviews.Title: Battery life
Reviews.Author: Deb "grannydeb47"
Reviews.Content: Not to happy with the battery life.  So far can use it for about 3 hrs before charging it.  Already went threw the hints on how to save battery life.  Not sure what else I can do to not have to charge it constantly.

Reviews.Title: How did I live without it?
Reviews.Author: S. Simons "MOM of  SGT TR"
Reviews.Content: After having a 'regular' kindle for 3 years, I decided to update (as a gift for myself) to a Fire HDX...WOW! ...such vivid pictures, and the ability to increase the print size with a touch of my finger is amazing!  I had over 400 books on my original, and they are there (in the cloud) or I can move them back and forth. I love having my Bible on my Fire, as well as several of my favorite cookbooks. I have even downloaded Craftsy classes and view those seamlessly as I sew right along! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE my new Kindle!!

Reviews.Title: Best Kindle Fire Hands Down
Reviews.Author: David Cripe
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kindle Fire HDX during the cyber-Monday special of $179, which was totally worth it as that price.  My family has owned the original Kindle Fire the past two years roughly, and this one is way above that version.  Is it better than the Kindle Fire HD version?  Depends, but probably not if price is your biggest factor.Pros:1) iPad Contender - Seriously.  The iPad in my opinion is way overpriced for what it does.  The Kindle Fire HDX is just as capable at handling most of the same work flow with a couple of differences.  Yes, this is tied to the Amazon App store.  If Google Play was standard, then Apple might be worried.  Right now though, Amazon is crippling their own success.2) Fluid Performance - Smooth as butter.  I have played around with everything available for the past two months and it handles it all with excellence.  Games, work, reading, etc run flawlessly (app issues not withstanding).3) Screen - Sharpest resolution I have ever seen on a screen this size.  Made the original Kindle Fire look like a 10 year old non-HD television.  I could stare at this thing for days (but won't).  Reading, movies, games, etc are shown in perfect HD resolution.NOTE - The blue pixel edge issue is there, but it is not distracting to me.  I actually kind of like it.  If you read a lot on white backgrounds, then it pops out more than normal.  The haze falls to the background after I begin reading the first page of something, and I never notice it much any more.4) Micro USB Connector - Bite it Apple!  :)  No cord carousal here.  If you have a cord sitting around, it most likely works for charging or connecting the Kindle Fire HDX.  For the first time ever - a plug adapter is included!  Amazon is including a plug adapter so you can actually charge the device through a regular electrical outlet.  What a concept Amazon!  That might catch on with other electronics (sarcasm).5) Bells and Whistles - This thing has it all (mostly).  Dual-band WiFi, HD screen, Amazon support (best in the world), light as a feather, etc, etc.Cons:1) Amazon App Store (sort of) - No Google Play?  I know Amazon wants everyone to use the device for their content, but not allowing one of the largest app stores on your Android device seems illogical.  I am able to use 3rd-party app stores to upload missing apps and outdated ones on the Amazon App Store, but still!2) USB Connection Port - The connection port on the device can be a bit of a nuisance.  You have to connect it at an angle on the device (around 30 degrees).  Just irritating to me for some reason as everything else has it straight, so your mileage may vary.3) Mayday Button Gimmick - I am a computer-savvy person.  I don't need help on where to press the power button or tweak the brightness.  If you are buying this for grandma or a person that never has used much technology in the past 10 years, then this is a life saver for you (no more annoying phone calls).4) Battery - I get a couple days of heavy usage (8 hours) out of it.  I just wish I could get the Kindle reader battery life of 4 to 8 weeks.  :)Overall:This is finally the Kindle to put Amazon in striking range of Apple on the tablet front.  If you crave everything Amazon like me, then it is a no brainer to purchase this.  If you are not, then buy it anyway as you will save at least $100 over the nearest priced iPad.  If Amazon would just switch to Google Play for the app store, then there is nothing that would stop them from ruling the world!  :)

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: New owned a Kindle or a Tablet and got this for Christmas and I love it! It's like a mini laptop to go! I highly recommend this to everyone, it's very user friendly and stays charged for quite a while.  And the possibilities are endless!! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE IT!!!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX7"
Reviews.Author: Sandra Lagerblade
Reviews.Content: Granddaughter is happy with the gift, so I am happy. The most amazing thing was I read a book on Kindle before it even reached the bookstores!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Janis Ruid
Reviews.Content: I love it.  It does everything I need it to do to my satisfaction.  I find it user friendly and the clarity is superb.

Reviews.Title: Awesome device!
Reviews.Author: Melanee Moore
