Reviews.Content: We purchased this for our son for Christmas he hasn't put it down since he opened it!  Great Buy!  He likes the battery life, the weight and size, and the portabillity.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire. This is the first for me nd i really like it! I haven't "searched" very much with it yet but I'm hoping that will b
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: This is the first for me. I really like it! I haven't "searched" very much with it yet but I'm hoping that will be easy too!

Reviews.Title: Its nice
Reviews.Author: Mahlon
Reviews.Content: Nice again to have an e-reader/tablet to read on instead of my smartphone.I also love the color screen for pdfs (much better than e-ink, or regular computer) for reading long pdf documents.Video is great, sound is as well, takes a long time to charge but usually even streaming over wifi and watching high def, I still get 2-3 hours out of a full charge with sound max.Also able to throttle it back decently if you turn off the wifi and brightness etc when not in use, works decently, but also don't expect a quick charge even with a high power charger hehe, I try and charge for no shorter than an hour for quick top offs, and 2-3+ hours if its more than 20% I need.All in all great device.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire HDX 7 tablet
Reviews.Author: William Lopez
Reviews.Content: I also have the kindle fire HD 7 2012 model and I love it.  Now Amazon has improved it with the new HDX and I love it even more. If people were more informed that the kindle tablets are not just for reading books but they can do what any android tablet can do Amazon would sell a lot more tablets.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: mlo
Reviews.Content: I was gifted a Kindle Fire HD for Christmas 2012 and loved it. I checked out the new Kindle Fire HDX and thought to myself I have to upgrade. I normally don't purchase every upgrade of anything electronic, but since I heard the HDX was lighter and you could mirror your pad to you TV...I was sold. The HDX is lighter, faster and slicker with the same quality associated with the Kindle. I do not for one moment regret my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Gerald Keller
Reviews.Content: Met all of my expectations. Easy to navigate. Nice screen size and vivid colors make it as nice as a iPad.

Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle
Reviews.Author: jcarter
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle. The price range is good and the graphics are great. I am so glad that now the kindle has a camera. This is a fabulous investment!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Alice C Taylor
Reviews.Content: Love this Kindle. Easy access to all apps and internet. Love reading books I have punches from Amazon on this Kindle because screen is clear and words are large. I would recommend to anyone who reads to purchase this Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 64 GB - Includes Special Offers
Reviews.Author: jwillin
Reviews.Content: I really like the Kindle Fire HD for what it does. I think we have to put all these tablets in perspective. I also have a 8.9" Nook HD+. So, much as been said about the Kindle that I had to buy one to see for myself is it all that it is said to be. I like the Kindle because of its size and portability. One of the main reasons that I can really enjoy my Kindle is because it has been rooted. This means that not only do I have access to Amazon content, I also have access to the Google PlayStore. This is important to me in order to be able to enjoy ownership of a Kindle.With it being rooted I can enjoy both worlds. The Kindle is a fantastic tablet, but in my opinion only if it is rooted. I don't like proprietary software and if you keep it with Amazon's offers, ecosystem it gets really boring quick. I am a Prime and Netflix member, so this tablet is great. I am able to fit it inside my purse and travel with it with no problem. However, the only reason I can enjoy it to this point is because it is rooted. It is a beautiful tablet and I really like everything it can do.Pros: affordability, portability, fast and efficient software (speedy), beautiful display resolution, versatile (if able to root), impressive device (makes me want the 8.9" just can't justify the purchase since I have a Nook of the same size)Cons: no way to expand memory, no HDMI ouptput, proprietary software, having to pay to stop special offers

Reviews.Title: I LOVE it!!
Reviews.Author: Barbie
Reviews.Content: Beautiful display, lightweight, no problems with using it immediately.  The only thing I do not like about is, when reading outside, your face is easier to see than your book!  I spoke with Help, (which is free, instant, and great), and she guided me to change font, etc, which I had already done.  Larger font helped but still got a headache.  I plan to check out Amazon to find filter.All said, GREAT.  So glad I gave myself this Christmas present.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: Jessica Cullum
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 11 year old. It is better than similar versions of competitors! Very user friendly and has a super clear screen.

Reviews.Title: awesome!!!!
Reviews.Author: deborah Meli
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet. It's so user friendly. The reading experience and gaming is out of this world. I just can t put it down!

Reviews.Title: Awesome! No need for an ipad!!
Reviews.Author: sherri birchwell
Reviews.Content: Gret quality. Built well. Similar feel to an ipad but half the price! This is our 3rd Kindle in our house. Cant beat it!

Reviews.Title: in love... completely.
Reviews.Author: B. Sy
Reviews.Content: I originally decided to buy a tablet for $100 made in the US. I got it and it did not even turn on. So I returned it and decided to research something better. I decided on a kindle because I also have Amazon prime and knew I could get free instant video and because I just love Amazon. This is my first tablet and I've barely been able to put it down.It's easy to use and does everything. Reading books on here is so much better than a nook.I got the version with offers so I was expecting a bunch of ads but the only time there are ads is when you go to unlock the screen. I think it's stupid to pay more for without offers.It's much faster than my phone and laptop. The 7" is the perfect size. The speakers are great. The graphics are the best I've seen.There are however a couple cons... I wish there was a rear facing camera, and I wish the Appstore had more apps.Other than that, it is the best piece of technology I've ever invested in!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7  is great entertainment
Reviews.Author: Pamela Koch
Reviews.Content: I am now a big fan of Amazon.  I pretty much found everything I could ask for. If I miss an episode of my favorite show,  I can buy it for a couple dollars and watch it again. I love the Cloud feature.

Reviews.Title: I love this Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Christine Smith
Reviews.Content: I got this one for me. It is light and the HD is pretty awesome. The colors are fantastic and life-like. I can actually listen to my books or music and I think the sound is good. The woman who "reads" to you doesn't have some weird voice, but you know it is mechanical. It is not annoying. Music sounds really good even playing it without headphones. I use it for almost everything: email, browsing, games. The games are bright and responsive. I have not used MayDay as I am figuring things out.  The battery is more than satisfactory and I have found it to last most of the day and part of the night. Email gives me some trouble and I learned quickly to check it before hitting send. You wouldn't believe what I sent to someone. It is a good candidate for "Damn you autocorrect". We had a good laugh about it, though. At any rate, I recommend the HDX. I just couldn't wait for the larger one, but I find the 7 inch is just fine. Thanks Amazon. People have complained you have to use so much Amazon items. I mostly use it as I am also a Prime member, so this is a no brainer for me.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7" -glare around the perimeter of the screen in book mode
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "osetleo"
Reviews.Content: I just bought Kindle Fire HDX which became the second Kindle Fire in our family. My wife was using the original Kindle Fire for 2 years and I was thinking to give her a new one and use the original for myself. We mostly use Kindle fire for reading books with occasional use for movies and other applications.When we loaded books to the new Kindle Fire HDX my wife noticed that in the book view it has very visible thin line of glare approximately 1/8" around the perimeter of the screen that is different in color than the rest of the text. Comparing with the original Kindle Fire it looks quite annoying when you read books.All other features and capabilities of the new HDX look very impressive.If you have a Kindle HDX 7 could you please let me know if this is something you experience as well or it is the specifics of the unit I got?Really appreciate your reply

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: mark heffernan
Reviews.Content: Above what we expected , Xmas gift for grand kid also cannot keep her off it, kids time was also a great purchase

Reviews.Title: What I think of the Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: ewalsh13
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my Kindle Fire HDX 7".  It is everything I expected it to be and would recommend this item to my family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Awesome for Crafters, Home Cooks, and the non-techno savvy
Reviews.Author: SinCityMel "Amazon Addict"
Reviews.Content: I'm a professional by the day and artist by night.I use my HDX for all the standard applications and enjoy the usual stuff (email, web browsing, shopping on Amazon, etc.)As a crafter, it's great for using a pattern and/or flipping through craft magazines, bookmarking pages, and highlighting tips. I also have saved pdf docs of patterns and tutorials on it. My HDX works beautifully, in the standing case, on my jewelers bench for various metalworking guides and for offline use.In my kitchen, the HDX is  a recipe book,  with recipes from the internet via wifi as well as files saved offline.Basic Pros -- The images & sounds are  crisp and clear,  which is a significant improvement over the original Kindle Fire.- Easy to use & navigate for the slightly less tech savvy (I'm an art geek not a techno geek and comfortable with Apple products.)- Kid friendly, my 2 yr old niece and 8 yr old nephew enjoyed an interactive story on it as well as the usual kid games and apps.- A lot (1000's) of free Kindle books, lower priced reads, samples, and the Prime lending library for a monthly freebie.Basic Cons --My 64gb 7" model doesn't  have  a rear facing camera but it's not enough of a con to knock a star off. I use a DSLR for my art pics and my iPhone 5s for my out-and-about snapshots, so using the HDX for an occasional selfie or web chat is  great.-The battery life isn't as good as it was on the old original Kindle Fire. Since this version does a lot more, it makes sense, and because I charge it daily.  I don't have issues with it dying on me in the middle of activity.- Overall this Amazon addict is pleased! -My  new lightweight Kindle goes everywhere with me. I take notes on it, play games, read magazines and books, and the previously mentioned craft applications. I love it for streaming shows and playing music. It's a great device and IMO (in my opinion) a truly good bang for your buck.

Reviews.Title: Very good item
Reviews.Author: William Perdue
Reviews.Content: Very good item - Only negative is the inability to expand memory by adding a larger SD chip or something similar.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I haven't had it a month yet but so far I like it I wanted to replace my IPad 2 mostly because of the size for taking with me in my purse much smaller and lighter,only complaint so far is it's missing a few apps I need  for workso I can leave the IPad.I'm hopeful that they will add them soon.

Reviews.Title: Suggestion
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: I am still in the learning phase.  If I could make one suggestion, that would be that there should be a quick set-up help booklet/pamphlet for seniors to use.

Reviews.Title: So good, except....
Reviews.Author: Linda Berry "technogeek"
Reviews.Content: This is so good in so many ways = speed is excellent, great for streaming videos (part of the reason I chose the Kindle over a Nexus 7 is the ability to stream Amazon instant videos) size is perfect for ebooks but not too small to work for videos, battery life is great. The only rub is the limited apps due to not being able to access anything but Amazon app store. Add Google Play access and I would give it 5 stars. I was ready to change from Kobo to Kindle for a variety of reasons but was hoping I could have accessed my already purchased Kobo books with an app on my Kindle. Should have done my homework better, my bad. Very disappointing, but really the only complaint I have with this handy little tablet.

Reviews.Title: good overall
Reviews.Author: Anita Werner
Reviews.Content: Perfect size and weight for me.  Easy-to-use.  Only complaint is it doesn't connect to our Wi-Fi until you stand within  3 feet of the source, then you can move away.  All of our other devices pick up our Wi-Fi anywhere in our home.  Each time we turn on this Kindle we have to walk back to our Wi-Fi box for it find it.  Even our basic Kindle reader works better with our Wi-Fi than this newer Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: For Me Better than the Nexus 7 !!!
Reviews.Author: Osvaldo J
Reviews.Content: There are two types of tablets, the regular tablets no tied to a content service and the KINDLE, if a easy choice, you can spend time going around searching for things you would like to have and use or use a content tablet like the KINDLE's that already have done that for you and have it presentment in a well easy to find, read to use secure environment for you and your kids.I use to had a NEXUS 7 which is a great tablet, but the issue in my case is that the best GOOGLE service don't work in my country, just in the USA...and sadly GOOGLE take like for ever to resolve that issue. So I decided to move to this great content service AMAZON have that have more that you can ever imagine to have in the palm of your hand. I invite you to try it ...you like me wont be disappointed and best of all tools and services work excellent outside the US.

Reviews.Title: All I can say is wow!
Reviews.Author: Carolyn A. Layne "knitting addict"
Reviews.Content: I previously owned an Android tablet which was a dismal product.  So far I love the Kindle fire HDX 7".  I had to use the Mayday button once when I was first setting it up and was thrilled at how helpful and easy it makes using the HDX.  I guess I am old fashioned in that I prefer to speak to a human being!  And you can actually see who you are talking to.  It makes it a great personal touch.  Thanks Amazon for coming up with this concept.  I am looking forward to using this tablet extensively.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Love it! Love it! Love it!
Reviews.Author: Noreen
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up, movies and videos are great to watch. I have had enjoyed the whole kindle experience. Customer support has been fantastic too.Thank you for exceeding my expectations!Noreen Otten

Reviews.Title: exceeded expectations!
Reviews.Author: Ginny
Reviews.Content: This item was for a gift and totally exceeded the person's ( Giftee) expectations! Loves it!!!!!!  5 stars  plusssss! would highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Not regreting my purchase so far ;)
Reviews.Author: Laura Geiersbach
Reviews.Content: I am loving this tablet. I've used android tablets in the past and I feel the Kindle fits my usage needs better. The lack of Google apps is not an issue for me. It hasn't frozen on me as others stated but if it does I'm sure it's an easy fix. Most tablets do that from time to time. There is definitely a blue haze on the outer screen when on a white screen but it doesn't take away from anything in my opinion. This is my first kindle and I think it's the beginning of a long term relationship. I will update if that changes but so far, so good.

Reviews.Title: Nothing but good to say
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: Lost my first generation Kindle and bought this one to replace it faster ,brighter ,and far better picture than the older model

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: kendra wheeler
Reviews.Content: Love it. .... No complaints!! Easy to use even for someone older and not familiar with computers tablets etc. Small but packs big power in use!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Wallace H Ford Jr
Reviews.Content: Really great.  I upgraded from the Kindle Fire First Edition.  Am glad I did.  Watching movies is wonderful on this device.

Reviews.Title: Love my kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Beverly Kimbrough
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the Kindle HDX. This is my third kindle, and I have been pleased with all of them. Amazon really delivers on their products!!

Reviews.Title: Loved it
Reviews.Author: S. HUTCHINS
Reviews.Content: Bought for my son and son in laws. They liked it very much. Shipping was very fast. Thank you for a good experience.

Reviews.Title: wonderful portable tablet
Reviews.Author: nekojita
Reviews.Content: Okay, I have officially bought into Amazon's kindle crack. This is not my first kindle (or second, or...). This tablet is definitely an improvement over the previous versions, it's more responsive, it handles video and web browsing so much better than the previous Fire generation, and I love the slimmed down version.The overall design is an improvement. The video quality is great, and music does play with a decent quality. Love the feature where it can display lyrics while playing song (if the mp3 has the information), thanks to the whole X-Ray/Lyrics feature. There's a lot of new touches here that are fun. I really appreciate the volume and the power buttons being on the opposite sides of the kindle now (don't know how many times I've hit the wrong one on my Fire >.<).Also, being able to have more than two browsers open on Silk now w/out it crashing all of the time is a great improvement.Some minor quirks - not sure if it's me or the tablet, but still trying to figure out how to get pictures already taken from my phone onto the tablet and directly into the photo folder.Have installed several apps without a problem, downloaded files and opened them, so far so good. The kindle goes everywhere with me (literally, it's the perfect size to fit in my purse). I wish there were more cover options for the 7", but it seems to be increasing the longer the kindle is out, and I think a cover/case is a must for one of these. This is the kindle that I do take everywhere, and on a recent trip, I used this more than my Surface as it has my most frequently used personal emails installed on it (easy to set up), I can access my social accounts, my music, and of course my books.The battery is... eh, decent. I can keep it on and play music for a few hours, video less, and use it to read books for most of a day. It could use some improvement.All in all, it's a great tablet that you can take with you.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Love It!
Reviews.Author: brfamilyguy
Reviews.Content: I Love it! SO much better than an iPad on So many levels! My ONLY question/criticism is that I feel that the speakers aren't quit as loud as my Kindle Fire HD. They are still loud and good though.

Reviews.Title: Excellent but too small for some senior citizens.
Reviews.Author: Polykid "Polykid"
Reviews.Content: An excellent gadget. However, for the elderly, the device is too small and too hard to handle, especially when surfing the web. I would recommend you consider the 8.9 size.Kudos to Amazon for devising such a wonderful reader.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 7" HDX
Reviews.Author: Phyllis Simpson
Reviews.Content: There are a lot of things I like about the Kindle Fire 7" HDX. It has a very clean and clear display. It seems a bit clearer than the original Kindle Fire, but at times slow to download and seems to have a problem holding the wifi signal. I have spent quite a bit of time with technical support trying to resolve this issue, but so far haven't come up with a solid reason or fix for the problem. I have also spent time talking to AT&T; about the issue and they have done speed tests changed the router channel and tried other things to help me resolve this issue. The router is just a year old and AT&T; have run tests to verify that it is in good working order. I keep trying what Amazon suggests and hope someday soon to resolve this issue. I think I will really enjoy using it when everything works right. This may possibly be a freak issue and I am the only customer with it. Overall I do think it has real possibilities. I would like to see a rear camera on future models. Taking pictures this way is very awkward.

Reviews.Title: Display quality (yellow border)
Reviews.Author: Amazon Kunde
Reviews.Content: the display shows a yellow-brownish border at its lower and left side. Using the web browser, it will be hidden but reading a book, showing photos will clearly show this slightly annoying anomaly. a replacement device (shipped within two days - BRAVO AMAZON!) was the same. other than that: works great and i love it!EDIT 16.1.2014As I have used this device for quite some hours now, the (disturbing) yellow border has disappeared. Now the device performs as expected. New rating: 5-STARS!

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Cindy Hall
Reviews.Content: Great product! Especially like the mayday button! Love the way I can stream Netflix to my TV! Might have to buy another one soon for my spouse.

Reviews.Title: Granddaughter
Reviews.Author: Richard  L Coonrad
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 12 year old granddaughter and she loves it.The fact that she can listen to music and play games and shopAmazon all on one unit is great.

Reviews.Title: it is great
Reviews.Author: L. McMillan "reggae mama"
Reviews.Content: The new kindle fire allow you to read books in portrait mode, which I love.  I still wished it had a camera that makes it easier to take.picture of my kids stuff.  I have yo turn around and be a nuisance in the crowd to get my pictures.

Reviews.Title: Wish for longer battery life
Reviews.Author: cmessina
Reviews.Content: Tablet works great. Web browser has worked excellent for me. 7 inch is great small sized tablet. Very powerful and great portable size. Sound and screen quality is second to no tablet - simply the best audio I have ever heard on a tablet. Easy to use - easier to use than my iPad Air. I find it my go to tablet over my iPad. Definitely the tablet I would recommend to newbies.Only complaint is that I wished the battery life was longer. I recharge every other day with heavy usage. Hopefully we will get some more battery life in future releases. I am very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: surpassed all my expectations
Reviews.Author: Papa.Jack
Reviews.Content: This is a great little tablet.  Does what I want and ask and the graphics are eye-popping. Highly recommended (and I generally pass on reviews but for the Fire HDX I'll make an exception).

Reviews.Title: Exceeds expecations
Reviews.Author: Don Verlench
Reviews.Content: Much lighter than my first Kindle, the screen is better, and of course so much cheaper then the ipad.  The 'Special Offers' are in places that they are not annoying.  Bluetooth was worth the upgrade alone.

Reviews.Title: Great for all ages
Reviews.Author: Katie Smith
Reviews.Content: My whole family loves this kindle fire! Great for playing games, surfing web, reading books... Very easy to use. Santa brought this mostly for the kids, but I have used it just as much! The parental controls are great, you can block what you want with a password. I would have given 5 stars, but the camera isn't great. Wish it had a better camera and flash.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: R. Bettio "lovetoread"
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my grandson and he loves it.  He seems to be able to do more with this new one than the one we bought him two years ago.

Reviews.Title: HDX
Reviews.Author: Danielle Wiley
Reviews.Content: Love it and so does my 10 year old and my 12 year old Autistic son. Fits easily in our small hands and took no time to figure the system out. Im still learning.

Reviews.Title: Nice gift idea
Reviews.Author: Army Sgt 8
Reviews.Content: Gift for my wife who travels alot. She loves it and uses it daily for work and for games on long flights. She also plays Scrabble with a friend a thousand miles away, pretty cool way to stay connected.

Reviews.Title: Present for my daughter
Reviews.Author: Lu A Britt
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas present for my daughter. She loved it! My only complaint was that she loved it so much, we couldn't get her to put it down long enough to watch everyone else open their presents!

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Anne Guest
Reviews.Content: I love it! It's a real "learning adventure" for a 68 yr old "Grammy"! I'm really enjoying all the Apps and playing "Candycrush"!

Reviews.Title: fast and durable
Reviews.Author: frostwolf04
Reviews.Content: the quad core processing unit makes gaming easy and reading smooth. the kindle fire hdx is also extremely durable on its sides to protect from drops

Reviews.Title: Loved it for media. Not enough apps.
Reviews.Author: mary j master
Reviews.Content: This was for a friend.  She loved the size, setup, and, of course, viewing media was awesome.She returned it because the specific apps she wanted were not in the Amazon App Store. If you can't side load or extract .apk files, you may not find all the apps you want or need - at this time. I'm sure the Amazon will enlarge their offerings with time.

Reviews.Title: Amazing, Fast, Beautiful display
Reviews.Author: Arthur Atlas "atlasarch"
Reviews.Content: I am incredibly pleased.  The HDX has far surpassed my expectations and I couldn't be happier and more impressed.  A great product.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Shirley Sierak
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for our son.  The year before we had given a Kindle to our grandson (his 14 yr son) and the four of our children had gotten together and given me a Kindle for Christmas.  Which I enjoy very much.  This it appeared on our son's list.

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet
Reviews.Author: Tristan
Reviews.Content: I received the HDX 7" with offers from a work Christmas party. So far I enjoy it and have since picked up Amazon Prime to go with it.I do also own HP Touchpad and the Google Nexus 7 (2013)Out of the 3 I use the HDX the most although I don't like the fact that my google account and app purchases don't transfer over. The screen quality is great and I am satisfied with the battery life. The ads don't ever seem to get in the way or bother me. I tend to take this thing everywhere with me.The only thing is I tend to prefer the straight android environment of the Nexus 7. Otherwise this is a great device.

Reviews.Title: Everything I wanted in a Tablet
Reviews.Author: SteveD "Steve"
Reviews.Content: Even though there are more flexible tablets available, the Kindle Fire HDX does everything that I want and does it well.

Reviews.Title: HDX
Reviews.Author: Paula Beaty "lilred"
Reviews.Content: I owned a Kindle Fire and really enjoyed it. I upgraded to the HDX. Am enjoying even more. The battery life is much longer. I can read a whole book without charging.

Reviews.Title: Better than Ipad air
Reviews.Author: Alonso
Reviews.Content: My kids love the new Kindle fire and I love the fact that I can control all they can see and play andset the reading goals before they can play or use it for something else.Really good device.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Betty D Bell
Reviews.Content: this kindle was a Christmas gift to my daughter and she absolutely loves it.  she does however have a problem with the camera part, apparently you can only take pictures that are facing the front of the kindle. this is not good because it does not seem you can take a picture of something you are looking at.

Reviews.Title: My Poormans IPad
Reviews.Author: Sarah E. "music Lover"
Reviews.Content: This is what I call my Kindle, not to be sarcastic, but to show that you don't have to spend a lot of money to have a good product. I love my kindle!!

Reviews.Title: NEAT
Reviews.Author: jesse
Reviews.Content: WHAT A NEAT GIFT! MY KIDS LOVE IT! Picture quality is exquisite! get yourself one today and change your life forever!

Reviews.Title: Loving this HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Gail
Reviews.Content: I love the fact that it is small and yet I can still go online. I love the HELP in person, that is very nice. I don't know all of the ins and outs of this yet, but it is very useful, and will be I feel

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Michael Kopiec
Reviews.Content: I have been a Mac person since 1984 and still love Apple, but what sold me on the kindle was the mayday feature. The picture is as good as my 13 inch retina display Macbook Pro, and the mayday thing really works. Really.

Reviews.Title: OMG
Reviews.Author: Virginia GC
Reviews.Content: I could not believe they could make the Kindle better and smaller.  A friend hooked me on Kindle Readers and eventually I purchased one for myself.  This one is truly not just a reader but a tablet with the functions of a reader and a computer.  I like the one click purchase of books and apps that I get from the amazon store.  I combined it with my prime membership and the amazing HD quality of the videos that I can watch for free is awesome.

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: Tone
Reviews.Content: Very user friendly...exactly what I expected.  I am very happy with my Kindle, ,and it it also very fast when downloading.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7", Wi-fi, 16 GB with option to get Amazon Prime
Reviews.Author: Adina Chipner
Reviews.Content: This product is fantastic! I can't say enough good about it. The only thing I do not like is it is not easy to use when downloading PDF files from other sources other than the given and having the ability to put that PDF (book, in this case) into the "Books" section. The other thing is I would like to be able to use a writing device to write my own books or to make notes on things I am thinking. However, so far so good with everything else.

Reviews.Title: Great e-reader and good tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Overall this is a very nice tablet.  Once of the better 7" tablets for reading as there are amble bezel space for holding it horizontally and vertically.  If you have Amazon Prime, it's even better!  The only drawbacks are the apps, since the Google Play store is not available, there are certain apps that won't be available on the Fire.  Other than that, it's a great tablet.

Reviews.Title: I never see it, the wife loves it too much
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My wife is totally happy that she can read her books and watch shows that have been out of syndication for quite some time as well as play Minion Rush and Candy Crush.  We upgraded from a first gen Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: Never owned a kindle or tablet before, but have seen & used others. The clarity is very good. I love the fact that I can read books, play games, go on the internet, & see my emails all in one product without a phone ringing. The size is good, don't have to carry around a laptop. Fits in my wifes purse. Just wish it had front & rear camera.

Reviews.Title: LOVE
Reviews.Author: jennifer curvey
Reviews.Content: The whole family LOVES the new Kindle Fire HDX.  We all have our favorite games on it, can check emails & even watch TV around the house or in the yard!!

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it.
Reviews.Author: Grandma03
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love my kindle.  I got it very quickly and have used it everyday.  Even though it is the 7 inch, the graphics is great and I have watched a couple movies that are 3D and it is fantastic.  Best thing of all it fits in my purse quite well, and goes everywhere with me.

Reviews.Title: First Tablet Device
Reviews.Author: Michael D. Jarrell
Reviews.Content: This is our families first tablet style device. We use it as a reader, for games, and to store family photos, which it does each very well. Pictures are very clear and sharp. It was easy to connect it to PC and transfer photos. Wish it had better sub-folder options in the Pictures folder. As a reader it has a screen that is bright and easy on your eyes. Downloading books is a snap. Daughter plays games on it occasionally and the graphics is very good. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is I don't like that Amazon limits you on the Android App selection to what they offer on their website. Very Apple type approach that I don't care for. You cannot download Apps from Google Play to the Kindle. You can but it requires actions that can put the operational security of your Kindle at risk.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: deno
Reviews.Content: It's great! Just haven't got to use it much since I don't have Wi-Fi at home yet. I know that I'll enjoy it a lot.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: EHU
Reviews.Content: Had difficulty using the display and had to learn by trial and error on  how to use it.  The screen is very clear and legible especially in lighted areas. I am not a techie and this is my first entrance into the tech world as a senior citizen. After several attempts on how to use Wi-Fi in different locations, i was able to connect with my local newspaper away from my home. I also downloaded a book which I read while traveling.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Item
Reviews.Author: Nathaniel Albert
Reviews.Content: Excellent Item.  Bought it as a Christmas gift for someone I love and they absolutely LOVED it.  I was impressed with the capabilities and the functionality of it.  It really is a great item to have, whether it's for personal use or as a gift.

Reviews.Title: GREATEST Kindle out there!
Reviews.Author: Jamie S. Chreiger "JamieSC"
Reviews.Content: My only problem with this product is that it doesn't seem to take a micro SD card to expand memory.  That's ok, though, the 2.2 ghz processor loads every single thing lightning fast and I picked the 64 gig 7" version, making it very handy to carry around.  Fantastic graphics as well...rivals the ipad as advertised.

Reviews.Title: the best
Reviews.Author: Joshua Jusino
Reviews.Content: way better than the ipad.  Works great for my daughter. we share it all the time.  better user setting too.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding product
Reviews.Author: Ginny
Reviews.Content: Received packed only in flat cardboard like a book.  I expected more packing for a package of this value.  The Kindle Fire HDX works beautifully and is easy to use.  I am still learning about it.

Reviews.Title: best purchase i ever made
Reviews.Author: Yolanda Castro
Reviews.Content: the convenience of this kindle and its vivid images are great.  the applications are easy to work with and fast.

Reviews.Title: Everyone loved it
Reviews.Author: Dennis S. Turner
Reviews.Content: I bought 4 four my sister, daughter, and grandkids.  They all love it and all of the games, books, movies, apps,a dn photos they can do.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Gerald Woodard
Reviews.Content: I love this product and easy to use,  takes a little time getting use to it, I would recommend to others. Thank you much

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: DLTL1980!
Reviews.Content: It is amazing how clear everything is.It was so easy to transfer books from my old Kindle to my Kindle Fire HDX.I was able to Skype on Christmas Day so we could talk to our son that lives in another state.It was worth buying just for Skype but I love reading on it.

Reviews.Title: nice tablet
Reviews.Author: frank campbell
Reviews.Content: Nice video quality and easy to navigate. Only wish camera wasn't limited to self facing only. Looking forward to future generation of tablets.

Reviews.Title: upgraded my kindle
Reviews.Author: love to read "Sheryl"
Reviews.Content: I recently upgraded my Kindle, my first was an original kindle fire.  The reason I upgraded was due to lack of space for apps.  Needless to say my new kindle has 64 GB and has been a dream to use.  There is only one thing that would make it better, it my opinion.  If there was a way to automatically create and assign collections as you purchase books.  If you think about it Amazon categorizes the books, just send the data and automatically assign.  Food for thought designers!

Reviews.Title: LOVEEE
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Billman
Reviews.Content: I haven't stopped playing and reading on this kindle since i got it. I definetly love it! Get yourself one!

Reviews.Title: Love My New Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Colleen Fegan
Reviews.Content: Love everything about my new Kindle!!! Especially the May Day button-haven't used it but a few times but the customer service people are awesome and so fun to work with!! Thank you for coming up with this idea- it really helps us that are computer challenged!!!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: Michael Hankins
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and you can can do anything. Love watching movies and.searching the web on this device. Love it!

Reviews.Title: New HDX is Awesome
Reviews.Author: Janine K. Upton "jtenscollectibles"
Reviews.Content: Received Kindle for Christmas and immediately started uploading apps to it. The only app I have not been able to get working is the HP e-print app for wireless printing. I plan to contact the Mayday support to help with this. Would like a camera on back of Kindle for taking pictures and USB port, but I'm sure that will come in a later model.  Vibrant colors, just like watching TV. Have used the Skype app and works well.  I like the Cloud features for storing pictures which I was able to upload from my smartphone.  Have not uploaded from home computer as I have years worth of pictures and do not want to have that many on the tablet for now. I would recommend the tablet to others that may be considering the Kindle Fire HDX.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: karla restrepo
Reviews.Content: the definition is really good, the camera is awesome, is fast and the screen is really clear,also the price is really good

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Luvlunarya
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle. The main reason I purchased it was for my books and magazines. My daughter likes watching her shows too!!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Lauralee227
Reviews.Content: Performs better than expected.  A great gift.  Far exceeds my previous tablet.  Highly recommend to anyone looking to buy a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Learning new skills all the time.
Reviews.Author: marge mildner
Reviews.Content: Started out mid 2013 wanting a new phone and/or new computer.  Both are operating fine but older models. Had the opportunity to play with an I-pad.  Initialy taken by the device but eventually knew that I didn't want that particular device.  After seeing the size and capabilities of the Kindle Fire HD X ,I decided to take a chance.  It has more than made me excited about my choice.  Biggest reason is the size. I-pad was too big in size for me.  Thhis Kindle is just the right size for carrying around and still having access to my computer,books,newspapers and eventually I think I'll add Skype, since all but one of my children live 2 to 6 hours away.  Made my phone and computer both better to live with without having to upgrade.  Now I have the best of all worlds.

Reviews.Title: My new best friend!
Reviews.Author: denise reeves
Reviews.Content: It not only allows me to read my books, but I've also learned how to play my games and watch my shows as well! My family is grateful for kindle e-books, the amount of space saved could now be used for other things.

Reviews.Title: Christmas wish came true!
Reviews.Author: Mary Byrum
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son who only wanted this Kindle for Christmas. His eyes lit up and he was off to his room to enjoy it. I haven't used it, yet my son says it is everything he had hoped for and more. It is easy to use, clear display and the sound is powerful compared to other units he tried out. We got the unit with the advertisements. The advertisements in no way interferes with his use of this Kindle. In fact, he says he likes the advertisements to learn of what is new and available. The advertisements only show up upon turning the unit on then go away. I researched for some time as to which one to get for my son. I'm glad I chose this one.  I would recommend it to others without hesitation.

Reviews.Title: Best Kindle yet!
Reviews.Author: Handgun Hunter
Reviews.Content: Worth every penny.  Better interface, graphics, and battery life than my previous 2 kindles.  It is worth the money purchasing the version without the ads - those things get annoying after a while.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX  is a nice investment in social media
Reviews.Author: momtosix
Reviews.Content: This is an upgrade for me from my kindle fire.  I love that it is smaller.  It is a big bonus that I can take a photo and upload to facebook right now.  16GB is more than I had before.I still love my old kindle and never ran out of memory.Highly recommend this easy to travel kindle. Wherever their is WI-FI I can connect.

Reviews.Title: new to amazon
Reviews.Author: D. Tobias "davtej"
Reviews.Content: I got the fire hdx 7 a few days ago and so far I love it and am looking forward to discovering new things about it.  Slight problem I had, the fire hdx wouldn't play my favorites you tube videos but my ipad air had no problem playing them.  anyone know why this would happen. Both Kindle and Ipad say they have incredible processors and other items to make outstanding systems.  I thought they would be on par.

Reviews.Title: Amazing graphics on the Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: j. king
Reviews.Content: I love the graphics and the speed of the new Kindle Fire HDX 7 inch tablet.  My kids jumped up and down when they each received this as a Christmas present.  They were glued to the device exploring all of the features including the amazing selection of apps and books available through the kindle store.  My kids being of school aged can easily use this convenient portable device for school research as well as downloading books from the kindle store at a more affordable price.  My daughter surprised me when she mentioned that the teachers were recommending the kindle fire to students.I especially like the May-Day button where you can instantaneously get live assistance to any question concerning the device.  At first this feature freaked my daughter but after getting help to rotate her screen, she quickly fell in love with this feature that is only available on the Kindle Fire HDX.  I also love that I can share my already kindle purchased books with them. I highly recommend to all.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX is the Best Tablet (Not just for the price!)
Reviews.Author: Brett Hall
Reviews.Content: Great product, Great value.Kindle fire has more than met my expectations and keeps impressing the more I use and play with it.

Reviews.Title: watch out iPad
Reviews.Author: Mr. Josh
Reviews.Content: I am very impressed with my Kindle FireHDX. You really can't beat this device for the money. Great picture quality and ease of use. Mayday is the real deal. Great tech support experience.

Reviews.Title: Staying with the Kindle
Reviews.Author: Robert H. Ward
Reviews.Content: Since we started several years ago with Kindle we have been more than satisfied. Satisfied to the point of upgrading every so often and our satisfaction is greatly met each time. Beside the clarity of the HD series we find that they are easy to understand and the tech help available is excellent as well.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: Amy  Willis
Reviews.Content: We have loved it ! No complaints wild recommend this kindle to any one ,Great picture , fast, lots a fun for our whole family

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Diane Carter
Reviews.Content: Great tablet for the price. I purchased this for my grandson and he loves it! He likes to play games on it as well.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Kathleen M. Joseph
Reviews.Content: My husband loves it! I only wish I had purchased the 8.9" screen. That will be for next Christmas!Kathy

Reviews.Title: Exceeded my expectations.
Reviews.Author: CORNELIUS J TOOMEY
Reviews.Content: Purchased 32GB model at Best Buy.  Great screen, excellent speed, no-brainer startup and easy-to-use.  Highly recommend to anyone interested in a tablet.

Reviews.Title: This item was a great buy. My 7 year old will not put it down he loves it.
Reviews.Author: Kippano Hamilton
Reviews.Content: This item was a great buy. My 7 year old will not put it down he loves it so much.

Reviews.Title: much more useful than my old fire.
Reviews.Author: Richard W. Donley
Reviews.Content: Using it more than my laptop for most everything  is much smaller and lighter than my first Fire. And battery lasts longer.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: Angela R Nitolo
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift and didn't realize that it immediately registered to my Amazon account; Christmas morning we used the 'Mayday' button right away and within 15 minutes the support team helped transfer me to customer service(through the kindle) and fix our registration and we were ready to roll. My fiancee loves it and so does our 4 year old son. I especially like that the HDX has the camera...I enjoy the surprise self photos my son takes.

Reviews.Title: Better than the iPad mini
Reviews.Author: Michael Hulick
Reviews.Content: This is better than the iPad mini. It's far cheaper and has all the features the iPad mini has.  The screen resolution is sharper than the iPad mini. I like the Kindle Fire HDX.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Wanda Holmes
Reviews.Content: So, glad that i purchase this gift for my grand daughter ! She and myself are very well entertain . Weill be purchasing prime in the near future.

Reviews.Title: Missing Feature
Reviews.Author: T. M. Massengill "navy_wife19"
Reviews.Content: I've had a basic Kindle for a couple of years now, and I really enjoyed it.  I only used it to read books, so it met my needs wonderfully.  This Christmas I got a new Kindle Fire HDX from 'Santa'.  I love being able to do all of the other things that a tablet can do.  However, my basic Kindle had a feature that my new one does not:  the ability to group books into 'collections'.  I mostly read books that come from series.  Call me crazy, but I get invested in characters.  I have several different series that I enjoy, so it frustrates me that I cannot group books in the same series to one collection.  I can have them listed by author, but I have two different series written by the same author.  After that it's alphabetical.  On my basic Kindle, I was able to put them in order.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX Problem
Reviews.Author: Gran Ann
Reviews.Content: I received my Kindle Fire 4 days ago and have had nothing but problems with utilizing the audio function for book reading.  I'm not talking about purchasing an audio book.  This is the "play to listen" function on books I have purchased from Amazon which I like to listen to at night or on trips.  The audio function will work for a few pages and stop on 1 title, or on another title stop at the beginning of each chapter, etc..  After several hours with 6 different people at "Amazon assist" , I now have been told a work ticket has been sent to developers about the issue and I will probably hear something from someone within 5 days.  The 6 people have all been extremely nice, courteous and completely baffled with this problem.  I love the Amazon assist button.There has been an inference that perhaps it is a fault of the publishers causing the problem.  My older Kindle, however, plays the same books without any glitches.  Since on a normal day the reading function will be used more than any other I will be returning the product if a fix is not discovered or a replacement is not offered that will provide the service I have come to expect from Amazon.  Wow, this is the biggest disappointment so far in 2014!!  I had so looked forward to this gift I gave myself!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Paula Marshall
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical about purchasing this item but once i got it I began to appreciate all of the different things one can do with this tablet but most of all i love the online help screen.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Tablet!
Reviews.Author: Donald T
Reviews.Content: If you are an Amazon Prime member this is a no nonsense purchase. Most apps are free. This tablet won't break your budget and is one of the best purchases for the money that I have ever made. Sound and display are great.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: I am not a "techie" and this was easy to start and navigate for this beginner.I had no trouble shopping and down loading or changing settings.

Reviews.Title: My 5yo loves it!
Reviews.Author: Shiloh S.
Reviews.Content: We bought this for my son for Christmas. It was easily his favorite Christmas present. It's easy to operate, the images are amazing, it takes great pictures... I think it's pretty handy that I can review apps from my pc and send them to the kindle.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: mbd
Reviews.Content: for the money, i am not sure you can find a better device.  i like the smaller (7") form factor, as it is just a lot easier for me to use.  the picture is fantastic, and the text for reading is unbelievably clear.  movies are also great, and i am glad they finally have added bluetooth so that i can play it to my wireless headphones.i do miss a rear facing camera, and a number of apps that work on the older fire don't seem to work very well (some audio problems)

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: JWoods "Judi"
Reviews.Content: This purchase was an upgrade for me from the Kindle Fire.  I am still getting acquainted with the features, but I would definitely recommend it to my friends and family.  The pictures are sharp and brilliant, especially when streaming a movie.  When I stream music from Pandora, I use an external speaker which makes it easier to adjust the sound.

Reviews.Title: aww some
Reviews.Author: don shaw
Reviews.Content: I don't remember purchasing this one but I would have had to anyway because I wouldn't have got to play on this one at all.

Reviews.Title: Pleased with purchase
Reviews.Author: Brad Batt
Reviews.Content: Awesome product, very pleased with my purchase. Just as good or even better than the Apple ipad. Very nice display

Reviews.Title: Love Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Audrey P. Hartman
Reviews.Content: I would highly recommend kindle fire devices especially HDX.  Easy to install and use and and any problems May day is there at your fingertips.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx7
Reviews.Author: EVELYN HUFF
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire Hdx7 is very lightweight and easy to use. This is my first Tablet and I found it very easy to use the apps and other functions.

Reviews.Title: Addicting
Reviews.Author: Louise
Reviews.Content: My Fire is addicting, oh no .......love it the May day is terrific, just purchased a cover for it. Amazon service is great and the Prime has paid for its self.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd kindle. I keep upgrading.  It does what a need and  more.  Only thing I'd change is the camera on the outside for pics not of myself

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Tina
Reviews.Content: I got the Kindle Fire HDX 7" as a gift and I've been using it for about 1.5 months now. I haven't owned a tablet before but I've played around on other's iPads. I feel like this tablet is very comparable to an iPad but at almost half the cost, I would pick the Kindle every time. I chose the 7" instead of the 8.9" because I like the smaller tablet and I personally would never hold up something so big to take a picture, especially when I have my phone or digital camera.Cons:- There is a blue/purple haze around the border of the screen that is visible on white. It actually doesn't bother me at all but it does bother some people. I don't even notice it's there unless I specifically pay attention to it. Even though it doesn't bother me, I would rather it not be there.- Battery life isn't great compared to the iPad. For the same amount of use, I'm used to charging every 2 weeks or so instead of every 3-4 days.- I don't like that the charger is plugged in at an angle instead of straight on. It's not really THAT big of an issue but it does take more effort than usual to plug it in.- This is more my fault for not reading/understanding the Prime benefits, but you only get the benefits of Prime if your account pays for it, not when you get added and another account pays for it (which completely makes sense). I was really looking forward to "borrowing" Kindle books for free and downloading movies to watch later offline but my husband wanted to keep paying for prime on his account and I didn't want to put my Kindle under his account or have both of us pay for Prime.Overall, I love my Kindle and it's a great tablet for the price. I haven't tried the Mayday feature yet but I'm glad it's there if I ever need to use it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect in every way.
Reviews.Author: afab4
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my wife to upgrade her original Kindle reader.I thought about getting her a Nexus 7, they are a nice product but I am glad I bought this instead.  She absolutely loves it.

Reviews.Title: Given as a Gift ...
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: My personal exp. w/ this device - It arrived in a  well designed package w/ all contents needed n w/ 73% power already - some apps r not compatible w/ the HDX that were fine on HD --Take precaution when searching 4 apps in Amazon store not all r compatible -- the device is thinner n a lot lighter - Once u familiarize yourself w/ the device ( easy 2 navigate ) - battery charge time only 4 hrs. -- the camera takes wonderful video / photos : additional options available 4 use w/ the camera -- one drawback > front camera only -if u desire front / back u would have 2 purchase 8.9 device -- pixels woo -- mayday feature haven't used it  yet -- has voice 2 text feature--

Reviews.Title: Great tool for everyone.
Reviews.Author: RSF
Reviews.Content: This device is well designed, color is excellent, good battery life, good sized screen, easy to use and generally all around handy device to have and the price is excellent for what you get.  I bought this for a friend and I haven't let them use it yet since I have been having such a good time with it.  This is the perfect device for the dedicated reader/traveler/movie buff especially with Amazon Prime.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Donald Mascot
Reviews.Content: It is everything that it's advertised as.  But I am still trying to figure out what I can use it for.  It's a nice eReader...probably the best.  And I can read and write email.  And I downloaded an app so I can view documents and spreadsheets.  And it shows my pics very nice.  But since I don't play any games, or watch movies on it, I am still wondering what the fuss is all about.  And I am sure I would be asking the same thing if I had an iPad.  But for the price, it's a very nice little device.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca A Hyde
Reviews.Content: I have a samsung tab 2 and loved it so for Christmas got the hubby a kindle hdx  and he really loves it. I have played with it a time or to and like it much better than my samsung tab it is faster , color is much brighter and not has heavy will have to get me one to.

Reviews.Title: Best Mini Tablet
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Bradley Smith "vVv ORION"
Reviews.Content: Super fast and BEAUTIFUL display and sound. Amazon HD content is gorgeous! BUT is missing 2 of my favorite apps Xbox Music and VUDU! Yes they are competitors but c'mon I have still subscribed to Prime. If Amazon offered to add my owned hard copy DVDs and BluRays to their Cloud then I wouldn't complain. Amazon please add this feature or give up the app battle.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindke HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: DN
Reviews.Content: My hubby got me the 7" hdx for Christmas gift and I love it! Resolution is soooo nice, I like the size it's not bulky, slim and light, perfect for travel, product works fast. I can play games and steam movies in Netflix. We so love the product that we got obe for our son. I definitely Recomend thu product!

Reviews.Title: Best gift to myself!!!
Reviews.Author: bunnywright
Reviews.Content: Anyone who has vision problems and has had to give up paper books this is it.  I purchased it for reading only but bought the HDX so my grandchildren can enjoy the games when they come to visit.  It gets plenty of use.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Nanaj7
Reviews.Content: not sure if it would be what I needed as being a newbe to electronics son has Netflix able to watch movies on his account books I would like to see rent for free for a month

Reviews.Title: Kindle # 4...
Reviews.Author: Gailbert1
Reviews.Content: ...and I love it! I started with a kindle (3rd gen), then kept upgrading like a tech junkie every time a new one came out...after reading reviews on the HDX online, st first I was a little worried about the "purple haze" issue everyone mentioned. But, after watching a YouTube video showcasing the actual performance of the tablet,I decided that little issue want enough to dissuade me, so  my husband went ahead and got it for me for Christmas. Once again, I think the performance of the kindle fire HDX outweighs that of the iPad on pretty much every front: display, processing speed, features ( I have no desire to use my tablet as a camera, so for those who would vote that as a deal breaker, it was moot for me). I love all the features, and even tho I have not yet used the Mayday feature, I think that is a great addition as well...no need to make an appointment to speak to a"genius"...mine lives in my device!! Once again, kindle delivered.  I am a kindle user for life!

Reviews.Title: Love the new HDX kindle!!!!
Reviews.Author: Doneit "Doneit"
Reviews.Content: Picture is exquisite and the sound is fantastic.Bought this one as a replacement for my previous 7" [my puppy got a hold of it].I loved the one I had, but this one definitely takes it up a notch.Highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: My Second Kindle - Love It
Reviews.Author: Joyce
Reviews.Content: Bought my first Kindle Fire two years ago.  My husband suggested I get a new Fire HDX this year.  Can't tell you how much I love the new HDX, but still use my old one too, just can't seem to let it go. Love this product and I am sure there are more in my future.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Edward Rose
Reviews.Content: This was a great gift to give my wife she loves it. Maybe she  wont go blind looking at her cell phone.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Nora J.Goodson
Reviews.Content: this was bought for grandson and dang I am jealous. I have the reg kindle fire and what this one can do is amazing and my daughter can keep her stuff separate from the kid zone that he is locked in so no purchases or places he shouldnt be this is well worth the purchase

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7
Reviews.Author: Wealthygirl
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire HDX 7!  Already tried the May Day feature and service was excellent!  Vivid color and excellent audio features. Would recommend this product to anyone considering making this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Loving my new Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: MamabearArndt
Reviews.Content: I received my new Kindle Fire HDX 7" on Christmas Eve as a gift to myself.  I had spend the last three months trying to decide between the Kindle and the new iPad Mini retina display.  At first I thought I might have made a big mistake choosing the Kindle mainly for the $275 savings over the iPad for the 64GB WiFi only model. I have had a iPhone for 4 years and have become very accustom to the functionality of the Apple products.  It took me only 24 hours to discover how to navigate the Kindle.  And I LOVE it.All of that being said there is 1 thing I wish Kindle would chance.  Kindle does not have "podcasts" for download.  Some of my favorite news podcasts are not available on Kindle at all and what is available can not be downloaded ONLY viewed through streaming which only works when I am on WiFi.  This limits when I can view these programs.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: Dr C
Reviews.Content: ... tho' I'm still getting friendly w/ it. I can easily recommend this product - it's a perfect size and having  the 'Ask me' or whatever they call it feature is terrific. Would definitely buy this again.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: TC
Reviews.Content: This replaces a first generation Kindle Fire and is much faster, etc.  this Kindle is very light and sturdy.  Recommend

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Dotti Spillman
Reviews.Content: Quick shipping, great packaging. love the item.  Bought for my 8yo daughter, she is on it every day!  We have an IPAD also, but with this she watches shows, plays games, reads, just overall wonderful item, half the price of an Ipad.

Reviews.Title: So much fun
Reviews.Author: Bonnie
Reviews.Content: I'm still learning how to use my new Kindle Fire, but so far I'm having a great time with it.  It is soooo clear and the sound is amazing for such a small I-pad.  I got it on sale at Christmas and was thrilled with the quality.

Reviews.Title: The world in your hands.
Reviews.Author: GPF "guitran"
Reviews.Content: I have been looking at tablets for several years, and already own the Kindle reader (which I enjoy for the convenience of reading and some games).  The Kindle Fire HD 8.9" was  a Christmas present to myself, and it was a great price to boot.  I found the setup to be ridiculously simple (already having an amazon account and another kindle), but I think that even first time owners will be pleased.  The videos on HD are very crisp (using a high speed router and Xfinity), and optional "Amazon Prime" for $79 a year provides the owner not only with free 2 day shipping on all "Prime" items purchased, but thousands of movies and shows are included.  There are a good number of "apps" available (many are free), and hundreds of free games.  For the price, this tablet certainly provides a quality interface with the internet and is more convenient that sitting at a desk or carrying a laptop.  I have also found many books and guides (borrow from Prime or purchase) that will help users to get the most out of their Kindle.  If you love videos or reading, playing games, "Skyping", or even phone calls (yes, there is a way to do that), I believe that you love this tablet.  Your only decision is whether to spend more for the "HDX" version, which adds capacity and speed, or for additional memory.  I am not a huge picture or video collector, so the 16 Gigabyte HD is perfect.  It is also a beautiful thing to look at.

Reviews.Title: Nice Product
Reviews.Author: Denise DeLamarter
Reviews.Content: I really like my husband's new Kindle.  My daughter and I both have older models.  We loved ours, until we saw the new one!

Reviews.Title: Excellent sound!
Reviews.Author: Leslie R Cooper
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for someone who has never owned a tablet and isn't particularly computer savvy.  The OS is easy to navigate, and I love that there is live help just a button away.  The display is also gorgeous and sharp.  But what really surprised me was the sound quality!  I love watching movies and tv shows on my iPad, but if I'm doing anything other than sitting down and watching, the sound is inadequate without some auxiliary speaker.  The first movie I turned on with the Kindle Fire HDX was plenty loud enough to walk away, with a really great tone - rich, not tinny.  I also love the size - it's definitely a strong competitor for the iPad mini.I love my iPad because I'm a student and the apps there just integrate well for me, but if I wanted a top notch entertainment device, I would definitely get this again.

Reviews.Title: SO FAR SO GOOD
Reviews.Author: Jordan "Jordan"
Reviews.Content: I received my new Kindle Fire HDX a couple of days ago. So far I've been very pleased with the device. The screen quality is great. The download time I found especially quick. The HDX is considerably lighter then the previous version.I recommend this tablet very much.

Reviews.Title: Enjoyed it!
Reviews.Author: Carlos Watson
Reviews.Content: Perfect fit for everyday use access to amazon prime a plus. Truly a consumer type device. This is not meant for business use.

Reviews.Title: Love the Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Nei'Shay
Reviews.Content: After careful consideration of the Samsung Galaxy, IPad (I have an iPhone), and the Kindle, I chose the Kindle. And I am very satisfied. I watch movies on it and it has a very clear picture. The sound is also great. No regrets at all here.

Reviews.Title: mostly fantastic
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Crowder
Reviews.Content: It's fast, works from all angles, offers a seamless interface for my e-books, Amazon music, Audible books, and apps.The Silk browser is fast and user-friendly. Light weight makes this easy to transport in my handbag. Excellent sound quality and video. Song lyrics automatically pop up on many of my music tracks. The battery life is pretty good, and the battery recharges rapidly.  I do with it had the option of using Chrome because of the transferable nature of my bookmarks from my laptop and phone. I have not yet discovered the task manager or a way to change the wallpaper and screen saver. Most apps that I used on my Galaxy tablet, which this replaced, are available. So far only Weather Bug and Pet Rescue Saga are the only ones I really miss. I wish I had chosen the option of adding a Verizon line rather than having to rely on my mobile hot spot for WiFi. I also miss having the ability to turn off the screen auto-rotate feature. The charging cable is a mini-USB which is convenient, since it's interchangeable with my phone. It's also angled to minimize the problem of it getting twisted and weakened when I'm changing it while I use it. The book X-Ray feature enhances the reading experience, such as keeping track of characters. If I change the default language to that of whichever book I'm reading, the dictionary feature changes automatically to reflect it, as do the text settings, even down to currency notation. On the whole, I'm quite satisfied.

Reviews.Title: May not be for large families
Reviews.Author: Scooter
Reviews.Content: This review is solely aimed to highlight a limitation of the Kindle Fire HDX.  After much research I purchased the Kindle fire HDX mainly because it advertised the ability to easily control access to content for children.  In fact, on the Kindle Fire HDX website under the "Kindle for Kids" section it states " Parents can create a profile for each of their children and choose what books, apps, games, and videos they want to give their kids access to."  This sounded great and exactly what I wanted for a media device for the kids.  However, upon setting the new Kindle up I found that the maximum number of accounts possible is 4.  We have five children and thus this obviously does not allow us to establish an account for every child.  If you have a large family you need to be aware of this limitation before you purchase the kindle.

Reviews.Title: An accurate review of the kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Miranda
Reviews.Content: I just received the new kindle this evening and boy am I impressed. I own a kindle keyboard so this is a huge upgrade for me. I am a huge fan of amazon and I did plenty of research on this product before even though I knew I would love it. I am a huge fan of the kindle. For those of you that post bad ratings due to lack of apps or other stupid things is your own fault for not researching this product first. This product is a KINDLE. This is not an ipad or other kind of tablet. For a kindle this is a very good tablet. The kindle was originally made to read books and even though now it is more centered around internet usage, it is still for reading. No you will not find the same features and capabilities on this kindle as you will on another higher level tablet. For the price paid for this kindle it is truly worth it. The color is beautiful and the processor is very responsive and clear. It really is a great upgrade for the kindle. It may not be up to the same level as an ipad but for the price and the fact that it's a kindle makes it amazing. This product is for amazon lovers and those who are dedicated to amazon. I have a prime membership and I have already tested out some of the videos which are great. I also love the sound and how the volume buttons are on the back. I understand that some of you actually have received a defective tablet and that would be a good reason to give it a low rating but it is a new piece of technology so there are going to be some defective ones. As far as the blue or purple hue when reading that everyone pointed out goes, I don't know if it is different on different kindles but mine is very faint and I can hardly notice it. It is definitely not a big deal. There are too many people comparing the kindle to an ipad. No it will not have all the same apps because kindle has its own browser called silk. There however is still a lot of apps available and I assume the popular ones wouldn't be hard to find. There is also a way to sideload apps and all it takes is some research on youtube to figure out how. I am very impressed with this kindle and I understand its greatness. For those of you that hated it because you did not do your research, you should be looking in to this stuff before you buy it. Again, the kindle is for amazon lovers and those who mainly enjoy reading and surfing the web. For those of you that simply play games and want a ton of apps, a different tablet would probably be better for you. I can't wait to learn more about my kindle and experience the other great things that are yet to come. Thank you amazon for your great products as always.

Reviews.Title: Xmas present for daughter
Reviews.Author: volebal1
Reviews.Content: Daughter was trying to read books on her phone which was way to small to read.  Bought her this kindle charged it and downloaded all her books for her and added some games and useful apps.  So now it is wrapped and ready to use for Christmas day. Now she can surf the net, play games and relax and read without struggling with the small print.  Will also come in handy entertaining the toddler grandchild with the game and book apps I added just for him. I have had no problems adding and setting it up for her.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!!
Reviews.Author: Kyle Smith
Reviews.Content: Hardware and form factor are great!Great power to play high quality games and listen to music with no lag.Rhe performance overall is really good and better than what i expected from a kindle. Never had a kindle but sadly couldn't keep it since it was on a 30 day trial.I would recommend this tablet to anyone that loves tablets! :)

Reviews.Title: GREAT GIFT
Reviews.Author: Micheal Andrisano
Reviews.Content: A present our grandson wanted, We had purchased one for his brother, who absolutely loves it so this was a no brainer when he asked for one this year, great gift.

Reviews.Title: HDX happy
Reviews.Author: Kathy L Cruz
Reviews.Content: So so happy with my kindle HDX! This is my 4th kindle and the best so far. I didn't get the kindle fire when it first came out be cause I couldn't see it when I read outside in Sun, I just adjust the background lighting on my HDX and it's fine! I also must be lucky because I don't have that blue.screen or outline most comment on.  Just so happy!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: linda p.
Reviews.Content: I chose this because my younger niece told me to get it and the price was right. I wanted it for when I was away from home. It is small enough to put in my purse and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Best Kindle Tablet They've ever Made!
Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed with the lightness of the tablet. Something that has been bugging ever since the first one was made. That's no longer a problem.  The display is top-notch!  You don't usually say that about a Kindle tablet...you can now.  The mayday feature is just bananas! So cool! The only thing that's really hindering this tablet (besides the lack of apps but that will come) is the email function. If they can't get some type of integration with Gmail then they need to just set up their own email service.  Cuz right now, it still looks bad in comparison to having the gmail functionality.  That's why they get 4 stars instead of 5.

Reviews.Title: Excellent small tablet
Reviews.Author: janice399 "JM"
Reviews.Content: It's small & light which works good for my walks. Everything about it is fast, the sound is good, and the display is vivid.I did have trouble downloading but was solved by properly registering the device.  Now there is no problem with it in anyway.

Reviews.Title: Good audio, nice size, good display, MiraCast issues?
Reviews.Author: traveler "traveler"
Reviews.Content: Good audio and display. I can listen to music while reading my docs and books. I mostly load my own music rather than using Amazon since I like pristine raw audio rather than mp3s. Sometimes I view video so I chose this instead of a paper white.Not enough applications on Amazon store however there is at least one good audio and office application. There are some reasonably good chess applications.The Kindle HDX does not have a hardware HDMI connector or a SlimPort so I can connect a large screen for presentations or watching video. After looking into MiraCast and ChromeCast I downgraded my opinion to 'IT's OK'.

Reviews.Title: I love my kindle !
Reviews.Author: jr Eller
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle ! wish it had a USB slot for printing etc., otherwise it's great! the screen resolution is great!

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: terri l. selvey
Reviews.Content: This little baby fits in my purse and does everything my laptop does and even more quickly.  I can evendo dictation on this for my job.  It's more lightweight than the Kindle Fire, which I also love.  I have 4 Kindlesand this one is rarely out of my reach.  I had to really look for the purple edges people were talking about,and with very close scrutiny I saw them, but then immediately forgot they were there.  Not an issue at all.For the price difference my only regret is that I got the 32 instead of the 64.  Maybe next year.  The camera,as some have said, is virtually useless unless you want to take pictures of yourself.  I don't want the bigger tablet because I like to be able to slip it into a regular-sized purse.  I hope someday they come out with a rear facing camera on the 7". I guess that would be my only disappointment, but from the reviews I knew that when I bought it so I still give it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7" Review
Reviews.Author: Becki Rasmussen
Reviews.Content: I am liking my new Kindle so far very well, I had another Kindle that was 15 months old that would no longer charge or hold a charge. I have spoken with others that have had the same problem. I am just hoping the new Kindle lasts longer than the first one. I have purchased 2 other Kindles that are about 1 year old for my two grandsons and i hope  their Kindles last.

Reviews.Title: REALLY COOL!!
Reviews.Author: Les Mack
Reviews.Content: I LOVE it! I have a Paperwhite with 3g WI-FI and thisexceeds it by FAR. The 4 G Wi-Fi works reallywell, the images POP out at you from the HDX display it's almost like 3-d. The battery recovery timeis very quick.

Reviews.Title: Talk to the kindle, it listens.
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I just updated from the original 7 to the new HDX version, and am glad I did. Overall it works better, faster, and so far no problems.It seems to have a bit longer battery life, but that could still be improved. Beautiful new screen image. One new feature though really impressed me. I found it by accident. Speech to Text is activated by a microphone button on the keyboard. It works amazingly well for me,  It was worth the upgrade all by itself. I spent in excess of $100.00 for a program for my PC, and have been disappointed with it. It is difficult to use, requiring many key strokes to get it going, not to mention the necessary use of a headset. The Kindle is very accurate in getting down what I say, not 100% yet, but closer than I can do with my fingers on the PC. Now, all I have to do is learn to speak in commas and periods. That unfortunately it can not do by itself. Just push the microphone button, keep your hand away from the microphone area, and talk.

Reviews.Title: Loving  it
Reviews.Author: Claudine Jancik
Reviews.Content: I  like  everything  about  the  Kindle Fire HDX. It  has  great  color ,  is easy  to  use and  I  can  read  anywhere  day  or  night,  which  was  my  primary  purpose in  buying it.

Reviews.Title: Genius Amazon
Reviews.Author: FreedomAndLiberty
Reviews.Content: This product is just awesome. If you want the simple Amazon Prime tool to shop,watch,listen...or need help.. just click mayday....This product actually builds my desire to purchase more from Amazon. Also if i want to install google apps it is possible. Seriously Amazon Prime is just the way to go for all your shopping needs. So ..it has a fast enough processor to game and complete tasks like surf or watch a movie. Oh yeah another big thing was....reading books...this thing makes it easy to read a book....Amazon Prime and this device just works and is a huge solution for many tasks just reach down and pick it up...only thing that I would like to see is Kindles offer more harddrive space....like a 1tb...yeah we are in a time of file servers aka cloud servers...but in times of no internet...a real harddrive is a must...face it 4G/3G is a hoax, its a joke when it comes to internet so don't fall for the 4G lie and highway robbery mobile internet companies charge for internet...Amazon seriously this product and your growing services is on the right track for the future. Just remember don't close off this device to just Amazon...that would be the end of Kindle. I wish I had the money to have several of these devices....sometimes i don't need the full pc desktop but have a certain need and this device makes it possible and does so smoothly very good device very good tool. Keep up the good work Amazon! Amazon has so much potential that could grow alot of business and create alot of jobs....Kindle HDX is worth having! And my boy loves it! I recommend this especially if you are a Amazon user. I used this product for 20+ days or so and I'm getting one for Christmas. Battery life could be better but so could the ram and harddrive...but for what I did the device was not a problem it actually was the solution for many many tasks.
